141b2(mdo sde): khams ji snyed cig yod/ rde'u 'di las ji tsam zhig gis lhag par 'phags shing lhag par tshad med ces zer ba zhig yod na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
141b3(mdo sde): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams kyi chos nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyis 'jal ba ni khyod kyi tshig 'di de dang 'dra bar bdag
141b4(mdo sde): gis dpags so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas gang blangs pa'i sa'i khams chung la lhag ma las pa tshad med pa de bzhin du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
141b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di kho na yang bskal pa dpag tu med par bstan kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan du zad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kye rgyal
141b6(mdo sde): ba'i sras khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'di bdag gi mdun na dpang du bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re
141b7(mdo sde): re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed cigs 'di lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing de
142a1(mdo sde): tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ til gyi tshul bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par
142a2(mdo sde): b sgrub pa bskal pa dpag tu med par mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes skad cig gcig la byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi brgya'i char yang
142a3(mdo sde): nye bar mi 'gro/ / stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi
142a4(mdo sde): cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bskrun pa tsam gyi bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang
142a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang / gnyis su med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang
142a6(mdo sde): mi gtong la sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro yang rab tu byed de/ bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa la mchod pa rnam pa thams
142a7(mdo sde): cad du mngon par bsgrub pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas mchod pa byed do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyi snang ba yang yang dag pa len to// de ni
142b1(mdo sde): de bas kyang bskal pa du ma dang bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal
142b2(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
142b3(mdo sde): du mar chos kyi dbyings yongs su dris pa bstan pa la mi 'phrogs pa yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i rgyan chen po'i rnam pa mkhan bzos ma byas pa nor bu rin
142b4(mdo sde): po che chen pos sbas pa/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi yan lag gi dam pa mgo 'am/ mgul du btags na de ma yin pa'i lha dang mi'i rgyan lngab lbub dag gis mi 'phrogs pa yin no//
142b5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rgyud de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos
142b6(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu po thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
142b7(mdo sde): kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba ni sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud
143a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur bas de ma yin pa'i ye shes snang ba dag gis mi 'grogs so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i 'od na
143a2(mdo sde): skye ba'i gnas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa yin te/ sems can rnams kyi lus kyang sim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa chos kyi sbyin
143a3(mdo sde): 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po yan chad byang chub sems dpa'i sa
143a4(mdo sde): dgu pa thob pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang sems can rnams rab tu 'jog go// kye rgyal ba'i
143a5(mdo sde): sras byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bgrod pa gsum shes pa yang dag par ston te/ chos kyi dbyings rab tu dbye ba shes pa
143a6(mdo sde): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can dang zhing dang / chos thams cad
143a7(mdo sde): yongs su shes pa dang / mdor bsdun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i bar dag yang dag par ston to// de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag las ye shes kyi pha rol tu
143b1(mdo sde): byin pa'i shas che ba yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi sprin ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa mdor bstan pa'o//
143b2(mdo sde): rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs med mu med pas bstan kyang thug pa med par shes par bya'o// de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen por 'gyur/
143b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsten pa'i byed pa can dang / gtso bor 'gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par
143b4(mdo sde): phye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pas mi 'phrogs pa yin no/ / sbyin pa 'am/ snyan pa smra ba 'am/ don spyod pa 'am/ don mthun pas las gang ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de thams cad
143b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yid la bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba dang / sa yid
143b6(mdo sde): la bya ba dang / stobs yid la bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa yid la bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yid la bya ba nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad
143b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor 'gyur/ phul du 'gyur/ dam par 'gyur/ rab
144a1(mdo sde): tu 'gyur/ gong mar 'gyur/ bla na med par 'gyur/ 'dren par 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren par 'gyur/ yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ba nas rnam pa thams cad kyi
144a2(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rten pa'i bar du 'gyur snyam du sems so/ / 'dod na rtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam pa ji lta bus skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la sangs
144a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob cing snyoms par yang 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
144a4(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba
144a5(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab
144a6(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed
144a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
144b1(mdo sde): du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par gnas par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
144b2(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar rab tu 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab
144b3(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyis chos kyi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lus kun tu ston pa dang / lus re re la yang
144b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kun tu ston pa'i brtson 'grus rnam pa de lta bu rtsom mo/ / de yan chad
144b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs can rnams smon lam khyad par can gyi rnam par 'phrul te/ de dag gi lus sam/ 'od dam/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ mig gam/ spyod yul
144b6(mdo sde): lam/ dbyangs sam/ spyod pa 'am/ bkod pa 'am/ byin gyi rlabs sam/ mos pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed pa dag kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i ji skad
144b7(mdo sde): pa de snyed du yang bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang dag gsungs
145a1(mdo sde): pa dang gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag mdor bshad pas bstan pa ste/ rgya cher ni bskal pa grangs med
145a2(mdo sde): mu med pas bstan kyang thug pa med par shes par bya'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni rim gyis mngon du phyogs pas rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
145a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su song bar blta'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las byung ba'i 'bab chu ni glang gi rgyun gyi sgo bzhi sa 'dzam bu'i gling kun
145a4(mdo sde): tu ngoms par byas nas kyang mi zad la/ yang rnam par 'phel te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan par gyur cing / rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du zhen par 'gyur te/ chu de ni thog ma nas
145a5(mdo sde): mtsho chen po las mngon du phyogs pa yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi mtsho chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu yang smon lam chen po'i 'bab chu'i rgyun gyi sgo
145a6(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi khams kun tu ngoms par byas nas kyang mi zad la/ yang rnam par 'phel te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan par gyur cing / rnam pa thams
145a7(mdo sde): cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyi rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chu de ni thog ma nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho chen po la mngon du phyogs pa yin
145b1(mdo sde): no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brten nas yod par gyur te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la brten nas
145b2(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po chen po'i bcu yod par gyur 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gangs ri dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / rnam par 'dal ba dang / drang srong ri dang / gnya' shing 'dzin
145b3(mdo sde): dang rta rna ri dang / sa 'dzin dang / khor yug dang / rtog can dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab bo// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gangs
145b4(mdo sde): ri ni sman gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sman gyi rnam pa thams cad blangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa
145b5(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i snyan dang gas dang / bstan bcos dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/
145b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa'i snyan dngags dang / bstan bcos dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa thams cad 'don pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na
145b7(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po chen po spos kyi ngad ldang ni spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ spos kyi rnam pa thams cad blangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras
146a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang / spyod pa thams
146a2(mdo sde): cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi spos kyi thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na
146a3(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po chen po rnam par 'dal ba ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad blang bas thug par
146a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa
146a5(mdo sde): dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
146a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper
146a7(mdo sde): na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po drang srong ri ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ drang srong mngon par shes pa
146b1(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa rnams bgrang bas thug par 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'gro ba can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang lam
146b2(mdo sde): dang lam ma yin pa gzhan gyi khyad par thams cad shes pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa gzhan gyi khyad par thams cad shes pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa
146b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po gnya' shing 'dzin ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin ning gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul
146b4(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa
146b5(mdo sde): tu sbyang dka' la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ mngon par shes pa'i rdza
146b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul thams cad yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po
146b7(mdo sde): rta rna ri ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing 'bras bu'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa thams cad blang bas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i
147a1(mdo sde): s ras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon du gyur pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa bstan pa'i 'byung gnas
147a2(mdo sde): yin te/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu dang / mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen
147a3(mdo sde): po sa 'dzin ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur
147a4(mdo sde): pa med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab bstan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rang
147a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang / mngon par rtogs pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po
147a6(mdo sde): khor yug ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dbang du gyur pa rnams bgrang bas thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras
147a7(mdo sde): d e bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyi 'byung
147b1(mdo sde): gnas yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen
147b2(mdo sde): rtog dang ldan pa ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug
147b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros can la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can gyi 'jug pa dang
147b4(mdo sde): ldog pa thams cad shes pa'i spyod pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do//
147b5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab ni dngos rin po che 'ba' shig yin zhing lha rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ lha rdzu
147b6(mdo sde): 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa bgrangs pas thug par 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
147b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yang dag par bstan pa
148a1(mdo sde): yongs su dris pa bstan pa rnams kyis thug par 'gyur ba med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i ri de dag gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po smras
148a2(mdo sde): la rgya mtsho chen pos kyang rab tu phye ba'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po 'di dag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smos la/ thams cad mkhyen pa
148a3(mdo sde): nyid kyis kyang rab tu phye ba'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgas
148a4(mdo sde): kyis gzhol ba dang / shi ba'i ro dang mi gnas pa dang / chu gzhan gyi grangs spangs pa dang / ro gcig pa dang / rin po che mang ba dang / zab cing ting dpag dka' ba dang /
148a5(mdo sde): yangs shing tshad med pa dang / 'byung po chen po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / dus chad pa las mi 'da' ba dang / sprin chen po'i char thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o//
148a6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam pa bcus mi 'phrogs pa'i grangs su 'gro ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
148a7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba la smon lam chen po rims kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dri ma med pa la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi shi ba'i ro dang
148b1(mdo sde): mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od byed pa la 'jig rten pa'i gdags pa'i grangs spangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'od 'gro can la sangs rgyas lad/
148b2(mdo sde): pa mi byed pa ro gcig pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu sbyang dka' la thabs dang mngon par shes pa tshad med pas 'jig rten gyi bya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i rin po che mang ba
148b3(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon du gyur pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu rtogs pas zab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la blos rab
148b4(mdo sde): tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yangs shing tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g.yo ba la bkod pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa kun tu bstan pas 'byung po chen
148b5(mdo sde): po'i gnas su gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa legs pa'i blo gros can la rnam par thar pa zab mos 'gro ba'i spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pas dus chad pa
148b6(mdo sde): las mi 'da' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i sprin gyi char thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas mi ngoms pa'o//
148b7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po gang gi tshe rin po che'i rigs bcu las shin tu 'das/ mngon par spags par gyur/ mgar ba mkhas pas legs
149a1(mdo sde): @par bsregs/ legs par bac+doMs/ legs par sbyangs/ legs par byi dor byas te/ legs par phug cing / rin po che'i skud pas legs par
149a2(mdo sde): btags la/ nor bu rin po chebai DUR+Ya'i rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba mthon po'i rtse mo la btags te/ thams cad 'od rab tu 'byung zhing rgyal pos bsngags par gyur pa de'i tshe sems
149a3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis rin po che thams cad bsdu bar bya bar nye bar gnas pa yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen
149a4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bcu la sa shin tu 'das pa bskyed par gyur/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / tshul
149a5(mdo sde): khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub kyis legs par bsregs/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas legs par bcos
149a6(mdo sde): lam gyi yan lag gi rnam pas legs par sbyangs/ thabs dang mngon par shes pas legs par byi dor byas te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas legs par thug cing
149a7(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab rin po che sna tshogs kyi srad bus legs par btags la/ dbang gi nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUR+Ya'i rgyal mtshan gyi yu ba'i rtse mo la btags te/ sems
149b1(mdo sde): can gyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu brtags pa dang / thos pa'i shes pa'i 'od rab tu 'byung bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
149b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rin po che thams cad bsdu bar bya bar nye bar
149b3(mdo sde): gnas pa yin te/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa zhes kyang bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen/
149b4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
149b5(mdo sde): par grol ba'i zla bas smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag par
149b6(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis
149b7(mdo sde): bsdus te/ dmigs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ji snyed par rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di'i bsod nam/
150a1(mdo sde): kyi cho gas mngon par phyogs pa yang de tsam du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
150a2(mdo sde): kyi yon tan bsogs pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas mnyan pa 'am/ mos par bya ba 'am/ gzung bar yang mi nus na bsgom pa'i rnam pa'i sbyor
150a3(mdo sde): bas brtson par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bas na gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos te/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /
150a4(mdo sde): bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang ldan par shes par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob
150a5(mdo sde): pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos/ rab tu
150a6(mdo sde): g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu
150a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'khrugs so/ / bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem mo// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
150b1(mdo sde): chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha'i gos kyi sprin dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin dang / lha'i gdugs
150b2(mdo sde): kyi sprin dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / lha'i ba dan gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha'i rol mo'i sprin dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char mngon
150b3(mdo sde): par bab bo/ / lha'i las shin tu 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa la mngon par stod pa'i glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi sgra grag go// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 'phrul
150b4(mdo sde): dbang byed kyi gnas su lha'i dbang po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang gi nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i khang pa na ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan
150b5(mdo sde): pa 'di phyogs bcu mtha' yas par byung bar gyur to/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
150b6(mdo sde): snyed kyi phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing lhags te/ lhags nas kyang 'di skad ces kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid brjod pa 'di legs so/
150b7(mdo sde): legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba dag nas/
151a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'dir lhags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor rnam pa 'di 'dra
151a2(mdo sde): bdag la tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / khong du chud par byed pa 'di dag nyid dang / don 'di dag brjod pa dag gis chos bstan pa 'di nyid lhag chad med par byung bar gyur to// kye rgyal
151a3(mdo sde): ba'i sras bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor 'dir phyin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdag cag ji ltar phyin pa bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i
151a4(mdo sde): ' jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang gi nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i
151a5(mdo sde): khang par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' phyin par gyur to zhes zer ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste/ byang chub sems
151a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ / rdo rje'i snying pos de skad ces smras nas// thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang /
151a7(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma pa'i 'khor de dang / bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po
151b1(mdo sde): ma lon pas zhag bdun pa gnyis pa'i tshe/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang na/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gzhal med khang na nor bu rin po che'i snying po'i khang pa na bzhugs pa yang thugs mi
151b2(mdo sde): rangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
151b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha b+hU mi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
151b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang chen po rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar
151b5(mdo sde): pab bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od gzer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba tshad med pa rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs
151b6(mdo sde): su ma chad pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang
151b7(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su song ba/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
152a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang mi ma
152a2(mdo sde): yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brtan pa// sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa nye bar gnas pa
152a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams ru da yongs su spangs pa// thams cad kyi bkod pa bas lhag pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bkod
152a4(mdo sde): pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa chen po nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
152a5(mdo sde): smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la rten pa na bzhugs te/ legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/
152a6(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa
152a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i rtogs pa thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/ dus gsum
152b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/ spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba
152b2(mdo sde): chos mkhyen pa la nem nur mi mnga' ba/ rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par bslangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su
152b3(mdo sde): med pa/ dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres pa'i rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid du thug
152b4(mdo sde): su chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/ nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de/ nyan thos tshad pa'i dge 'dun thams cad kyang cang shes pa// sangs
152b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sras/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ tshul khrims shin tu rnam par dag pa/ chos 'dod pa rnams bde bar phrad pa/ thos pa mang ba/ thos pa kun tu 'dzin
152b6(mdo sde): pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ legs par bsam pa sems pa/ legs par smra ba brjod pa/ legs par bya ba'i las byed pa// shes rab myur ba/ shes rab mgyog pa/ shes rab rno ba/ nges par byung ba'i shes rag ngas
152b7(mdo sde): par rtogs pa'i shes rab can/ shes rab che ba/ shes rab yangs pa/ shes rab zab pa/ shes rab mnyam pa med pa/ shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/
153a1(mdo sde): tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa/ yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po// spyod lam rab tu zhig/ phun sum tshogs pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa chen po dang ldan pa// bde ba
153a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la sogs pa/ byang chub samA dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa
153a3(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa/ thams cad kyang gnas chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi nges par byung ba/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/ bskal pa dang bskal pa ma
153a4(mdo sde): yin par rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud phyir rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la byed pa las ring du gyur pa/ chen
153a5(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang / bde bas nye bar brtan pa/ 'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bgrod pa gcig tu gyur pa can/ sems can thams cad
153a6(mdo sde): kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sa mngon du gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ shin tu
153a7(mdo sde): 'dus pa chos lngas sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
153b1(mdo sde): dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis so// shin tu 'dus pa de la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni gzugs
153b2(mdo sde): su gyur pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing sna tshogs ma yin te ro gcig go/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam
153b3(mdo sde): par dag pa yang / shes bya sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun na yod kyang des brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing sna tshogs ma yin te ro gcig go/ shin tu 'dus pa/ 'di lta ste
153b4(mdo sde): dper na nam mkha' ni gzugs su gyur pa thams cad la tha mi dad par zhugs kyang gzugs kyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang ma gos so/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
153b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa yang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su grub pas tha mi dad par zhugs kyang sems can gyi nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'di lta ste/
153b6(mdo sde): dper na nam mkha'i ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las su gyur pa thams cad kyi go 'byed kyang nam mkha' ni rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin
153b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang ye shes dang sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba sgrub pa thams cad kyis go 'byed kyang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni rtsol
154a1(mdo sde): ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la gzugs kyi skye ba yang snang / 'jig pa yang snang ste/ de la nam mkha' na skye
154a2(mdo sde): ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang / ye shes dang sprul pa dang sems can gyi bya ba bsgrub pa thams
154a3(mdo sde): cad kyi skye ba yang snang / 'jig pa yang snang ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la gzugs kyi rnam
154a4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs rnams kyi 'phel ba yang snang 'grib pa yang snang ste/ nam mkha' la ni 'phel ba yang med 'grib pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
154a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa la yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i snying ku 'phel ba yang snang / nub pa yang snang ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni 'phel ba yang med/ 'grib pa
154a6(mdo sde): yang med do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la phyogs bcu na gzugs su gyur pa/ g.yo ba rnams mtha' yas mu med kyang /
154a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/ 'gul ba med do// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ mtha' thug pa med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
154b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la/ phyogs bcu na sems can la phan pa nye bar gnas pa phan pa mtha' yas mu med kyis/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la ni 'gro ba 'am
154b2(mdo sde): 'ong ba 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/ 'gul ba med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig pa yang snang / chags pa yang snang ste/ nam mkha' ni 'jig pa yang med
154b3(mdo sde): chags pa yang med do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyis dbyings rnam par dag pa la/ rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las
154b4(mdo sde): 'da' ba dpag tu med pa dag snang ste/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang med/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na
154b5(mdo sde): gzugs su gyur pa nam mkha' la rten pa dag la/ snang ba dang / 'drul ba dang / 'tshig pa dang / skam par 'gyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs kyang / nam mkha' ni de dag gis 'gyur ba yang mang
154b6(mdo sde): la yongs su skyo ba yang med do/ / de bzhin du sems can gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la rten pa la bslab pa dang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las
154b7(mdo sde): log par sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs kyang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni/ de dag gis 'gyur ba yang med la yongs su skyo ba med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rten
155a1(mdo sde): pa'i sa chen po yang dmigs/ ri chen po sna tshogs dang / me snang ba dang / bya rgyu ba dag dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu ba dag kyang dmigs te/ nam mkha' ni de dag gi mtshan nyid
155a2(mdo sde): ma yin no/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
155a3(mdo sde): mthong ba'i phung po dag kyang dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni de dag gi mtshan nyid ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan dag las yang dag par byung ba/
155a4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dmigs te/ nam mkha' ni de la rtsol ba yang meng mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin
155a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la yang rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa dag ni dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par
155a6(mdo sde): dag pa la ni rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// shin tu 'dus pa me long lta bu'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor la brten nas gzugs brnyan dag 'byung ngo // /
155a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ skye mched dang / de'i yul dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag snang ngo // de lta
155b1(mdo sde): bas na me long gi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor mnyam pas mnyam ste/ des na me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de bas na me lod kyi dkyil
155b2(mdo sde): 'khor de ni de'i dper rig par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na mi bsod nams 'dod pa la la zhig gis skyon bsal ba dang yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir/ skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rang
155b3(mdo sde): gi lus kyi skyon dang yon tan la so sor rtog par bya ba'i ched du me long gi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas bzang por mi 'gul bar bzhag pa ltar/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar bsal zhing bskyed
155b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa ji snyed pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la so sor rtog par bya ba'i ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i
155b5(mdo sde): ye shes chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gnas su bzhag pas/ rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyi phyir mi g.yo ba yang de dang 'dra'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor legs par phyis pa
155b6(mdo sde): gsal zhing rnam par dngas la g.ya' med pa ni/ kun tu lam me thal le lhang nge'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma gsal
155b7(mdo sde): bde la rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bzung bas/ shin tu sbyangs pa gsal zhing rnam par dang la/ rnyog pa med pa yang sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ kun tu lham mthal
156a1(mdo sde): le ljang nge'o/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs kyi rkyen la ltos nas gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin
156a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can gyi dus kyi rkyen la ltos na/ shes pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ me long
156a3(mdo sde): gi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag 'byung yang / de dag me long gi dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la me long gi dkyil 'khor de rtsol ba yang
156a4(mdo sde): meng / mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes la shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshog mang po dag 'byung yang / shes pa'i
156a5(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan de dag mi long lta bu'i ye shes kyis dkyil 'khor de la yod pa yang ma yin la/ de la me long lta bu'i ye shes de rtsol ba yang med/ mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// 'di lta
156a6(mdo sde): ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de dag mi mnye ba dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan
156a7(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang / shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mang po de dag dang ldan
156b1(mdo sde): pa yang ma yin/ / mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ de dag mi nye ba dang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ngos thams cad nas legs par
156b2(mdo sde): phyis pa'i mdun dang zur dang rgyab kun nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam pa yongs su ma chad cing tshad med
156b3(mdo sde): pa kun nas shin tu spungs pa yang shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya/
156b4(mdo sde): pab dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas nges par 'byung bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po pa rnams theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi thog/
156b5(mdo sde): pa pa'i shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i shes pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams dang / theg pa chen po pa'i shes pa'i gzugs rnams kyi rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro//
156b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la 'di lta ste/ sa dang ri dang / shing dang khyim dang gzhal med khang chen po dag dmigs te/ me long gi dkyil 'khor ni de'i tshad ma yin no//
156b7(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar gyi ye shes kyi gzugs
157a1(mdo sde): brnyan dag kyang dmigs/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag kyang dmigs te/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la ni chang yongs
157a2(mdo sde): su chad pa gang yang med do/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor ni gzugs gzhan gyis bsgribs pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de
157a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos zin pa/ dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan pas bsgribs pa dag gi shes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i
157a4(mdo sde): rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mun pa'i nang du zhag pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur ro//
157a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang sems can nyes par spyod pa la dga' ba/ ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa rnams kyi shes pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan
157a6(mdo sde): du mi 'gyur te/ snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor ni ha cang bskal pa'i yul na 'dug pa'i gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi
157a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang // sems can chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las rnam par ma dag pa la gnas pa rnams dang / 'dod pa can
157b1(mdo sde): ma yin padan na shes pa'i gzugs panas 'byung ba'i rdum can dun 'gyu/ da ma yin par gyur/ dus pasanyas pa nyid kyi nas na yongs su gru na /
157b2(mdo sde): las rig par bya ste/ mtshan ma dang bdag po dang / dga' ba mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa yongs su grub pa las dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyams su myong ba mnyam pa nyid khong du rdung
157b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su grub pa las dang / mtshan nyid dben pa can mtshan nyid med pa mnyam pa nyid khong du chud ba yongs su grub pa las dang / yongs su skyob pa'i rnam pa'i byams pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid
157b4(mdo sde): yongs su grub pa las dang / yal bar mi 'dor ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje chen po'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / sems can thams cad la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du gzugs kyi
157b5(mdo sde): sku kun tu ston pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / sems can thams cad kyis gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / 'jig rten nye bar zhi ba ro gcig pa mnyam
157b6(mdo sde): pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / 'jig rten gyi chos bde ba dang sdug bsngal ro gcig pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las dang / yon tan shin tu bskyed pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su grub pa las so//
157b7(mdo sde): shin tu 'dus pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can gyi khams kyi gnas yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
158a1(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dag gi sgo dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
158a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni cig car sems can rnams kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi rgyu yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor
158a3(mdo sde): rtog pa'i ye shes kyang / cig car shes bya thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs can gyi rgyu yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni kun dga' ra ba
158a4(mdo sde): dang / nags tshal dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba sna tshogs de dag gis lam me thal le lhang nge'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa
158a5(mdo sde): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyams dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag gis lam me thal le lhang nge'o//
158a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na 'di lta ste/ gling bzhi pa dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'jab bral dang / dga' ldan dang /
158a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris la sogs pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang 'jig
158b1(mdo sde): rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgud pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par 'grub
158b2(mdo sde): pa ma lus pa la so sor rtog pas shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni sems can gyi longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin/
158b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bstan pas/ chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa chen por
158b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha dang / mi'i 'gro ba dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin
158b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i 'gro ba lnga po rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
158b6(mdo sde): na 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams ngag snang ngo / / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la ying / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i khams gsum
158b7(mdo sde): po rnam pa rab tu dbye ba mtha' yas pa dag snang ngo / / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab la sogs pa rin po che'i ri dag dmigs so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
159a1(mdo sde): kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i chos rgya chen po ston padag snang ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi
159a2(mdo sde): khams na rgya mtsho chen po zab pa mi 'khrug pa dag dmigs so/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la yang mu stegs dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'khrug
159a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos ston pa dag snang ngo / / 'di lta ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams ni ri khor yug chen po rnams kyis kyang kun nas yongs su bskor ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
159a4(mdo sde): so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad la kun tu rmongs pa med pa'i ri rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ro/ /
159a5(mdo sde): shin tu 'dus pa bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las rtsol ba las byung ba des/ sems can rnams zhing las dang / tshong byed pa dang / rgyal po'i zham
159a6(mdo sde): ring byed pa la sogs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las rtsol ba las byung ba des kyang / de bzhin
159a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams sems can las dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad kyis rgyags shing dregs pa rnams la/ las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad nye bar bstan nas zil gyis mnan te/ thabs mkhas
159b1(mdo sde): pa des kyang / sems can rnams bstan pa la dad par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las yongs su spyod par/
159b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba des sems can rnams gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams la yongs su spyod do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las yongs su spyod par
159b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can so so'i skye mched du skyes par gyur pa rnams la/ skye ba mnyam pa nyid nye bar ston par mdzad cing ris mthun pa yongs su spyod pa
159b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid bstan pas kyang / sems can rnams dbang du mdzad nas thabs mkhas pa des kyang bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
159b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi lus kyi las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams la legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong
159b6(mdo sde): ngo / / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes/ sku sprul pa'i 'phrin las sku nyams su btang bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang
159b7(mdo sde): skyes pa rabs kyi snga dang / dka' ba spyod pa thams cad sku nyams su btar ba yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can rnams dad par mdzad nas/ thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnam bstan pa la
160a1(mdo sde): 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can gyi ngag gi las yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems
160a2(mdo sde): can rnams phan tshun smra zhing kun tu smra la so so yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las yang dag par dga'
160a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po thos pa tsam gyis kyang / sems can byis pa'i shes rab can dad par byed pa'i chos ston pa la rab tu 'jug cing
160a4(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi
160a5(mdo sde): las sbyor bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams phan tshun du bya ba dag la rnam par sbyor bar byed do/ / der 'khrul pa la rnam par smod/ ma 'khrul pa la bstod cing 'bod do// de bzhin du de bzhin
160a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las sbyor bar 'gyur des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag pa'i bslab pa 'cha' bar mdzad la/ de la
160a7(mdo sde): bag med pa la ni smod/ bag yod pa la ni bstod cing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'i gang zag rnam par 'jog pa dag kyang mdzad la/ thabs mkhas pa
160b1(mdo sde): des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi ngag gi las yang dag par
160b2(mdo sde): go bar 'gyur ba des kyang sems can rnams phan tshun du don bye brag tu mi shes pa bye brag tu shes par byed cing / snyan dngags dang bstan bcos rnams kyang yang dag par rjod par byed do//
160b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes gsung sprul pa'i 'phrin las yang dag par go bar byed pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can dpag tu med pa
160b4(mdo sde): dag gi the tsom gyi rnam pa dpag tu med pa dag zlog par mdzad cing thabs mkhas pa des kyang / sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad// rnam par
160b5(mdo sde): grol bar mdzad do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des/ sems can rnams bya ba dang mi bya ba dag rnam par nges par byed do//
160b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa'i 'phrin las rnam par nges par 'gyur ba des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi
160b7(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rnam par nges par mdzad cing / thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/
161a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las mngon par du byed par 'gyur ba des sems can rnams bsams nas las kun
161a2(mdo sde): nas slong ba mngon par 'du byed do/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba des kyang
161a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi spyod pa de dang de dag kun tu spyod pa dang / kun tu spyod pa'i yon tan dang / nyes pa dag yang dag par dpyad nas de dor ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir/
161a4(mdo sde): gnyen po rnams mngon par 'du mdzad cing / thabs mkhas pa des kyang / sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
161a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams las kun nas slong bar byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya ba sgrub
161a6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i gnyen po'i chos bstan pa'i phyir/ ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang /
161a7(mdo sde): yi ge'i tshogs rnams la dga' bar mdzad cing // thabs mkhas pa des kyang sems can rnams bstan pa la 'dzud par mdzad/ yongs su smin par mdzad/ rnam par grol bar mdzad do//
161b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can rnams kyi yid kyi las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba des sems can rnams bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor nyams su myong ngo // de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya/
161b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa'i ye shes thugs sprul pa'i 'phrin las nyams su btang bar 'gyur ba des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dri ba lung bstan pa mgo gcig pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dri ba dang / bzhag
161b3(mdo sde): pa dag ci rigs par dris pa lung bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang de ltar gyi don rnams nyams su btar bar mdzad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang
161b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' shin tu 'dus kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag na// 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par yong
161b5(mdo sde): spyad pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kho na'i lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shin tu 'dus pa 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa
161b6(mdo sde): ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang yin par blta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes
161b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par longs spyad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi legs par blta lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi yin te/ mi skye
162a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de dag ni gnyis su 'du shes pa'i gnyen po 'di lta ste/ bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa'i gnyen pos sems mnyam pa nyid thob ste/ de dag de yan/
162a2(mdo sde): chad bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa yang mi 'byung la/ 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
162a3(mdo sde): ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba'i
162a4(mdo sde): dpe mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa dpe mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji srid du 'dres
162a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshal du zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag la/ lha'i longs spyod dngos po dang / nyams su myong ba dang / nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo nas kyang 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa rnams kun tu mi gnas kyi//
162a6(mdo sde): nam 'dres pa'i tshal du zhugs par 'gyur ba de na 'dres pa'i tshal gyi mthu 'di 'dra ste/ gang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha der zhugs pa rnams la lha'i longs spyod dngos po dang / nyams su myong ba dang /
162a7(mdo sde): nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo nas kyang / 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa rnams kun tu gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par ma gyur pa
162b1(mdo sde): de srid du sems mnyam pa nyid ma thob par de dag la btang snyoms nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang med pa gang dag yin pa yang thob par mi 'gyur la/ gnyis su 'du shes pa de dag la
162b2(mdo sde): 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa yang kun tu mi gnas so/ / nam mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de na gnyis su 'du shes pa'i ga
162b3(mdo sde): pos sems mnyam pa nyid thob nas nyan thos dang / / rang sangs rgyas thamaso cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i btang snyoms kyang thob cing de dag la 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa 'bras bu ro gcig pa
162b4(mdo sde): ye shes rdzogs par longs spyad pa yang kun tu gnas so/ / shin tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ dper na chu bo dang / chu bran rnam pa mang po dag ni/ ji srid du rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par ma gyur pa
162b5(mdo sde): desrid du gnas tha dad pa dang / tshu ba dad pa dang / chu chung ba dang / chu skye 'grib yod pa dang / so sor rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi chu dang / srog chags chu skyes nyung ngu dag gi 'tshe ba nye bar
162b6(mdo sde): rten pa'i gnas yin no/ / nam rgya mtsho chen po la zhen par gyur pa de na gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / chu ba dad pa ma yin pa dang / chu tshad med pa dang / chu skye 'grib med pa dang / bya ba gcig sgrub
162b7(mdo sde): ba'i las can gyi chu dang / srog chags chu skyes phal po che chen po rnams kyi 'tsho ba nye bar ston pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
163a1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ gnas pa dang pa dang / ye shes pa dad pa dang / ye shes chung ba dang / ye shes 'phel 'grib yod pa dang /
163a2(mdo sde): so so rang gi bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang / gdul ba'i sems can nyung ngu dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas ma yin no// nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgya
163a3(mdo sde): mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa de nyid na/ / gnas tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / ye shes tshad med pa dang / ye shes 'phel 'grib med pa dang / 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa
163a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu ro gcig pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i las can gyi ye shes dang / gdul ba'i sems can phal po che dag yongs su smin par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas yin no// de nas bcom
163a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// sgrib gnyis ldan dag mtshan nyid can// dngos po shes pa de dmigs pa// dbang zad mi shes
163a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid can/ / de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas// bsgoms las yang dag 'grub pa can// sems can kun gyi gnyis skyed pa/ gtan du mi zad 'bras bu can// sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul
163a7(mdo sde): pa/ sbyor ba'i thabs kyi 'phrin las can// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams ni// dpag tu med pa gnyis dang ldan// rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang / sprul pas tha dad 'jug
163b1(mdo sde): pa can/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag 'di ni yang dag brjod// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b2(mdo sde): po shin tu 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
163b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
163b4(mdo sde): sngon rgya las 'gyur ba rnying pa brda ma bcos pa'o// // / rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi ni sla ma na sU tra/ bod skad du/ mngon par byung ba'i mdo//
163b5(mdo sde): / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig nyid kyi dbu ni rin chen 'od ldan dang / btsun mo pad+ma kha bye ma snyid mdangs ldan mas// slong ba dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang
163b6(mdo sde): brnyes gyur cing / / chos rnams ston mdzad zhi ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang ji snyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur cing // srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhi 'gyur la//
163b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i// zam pa gcig pu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo// gang la yon tan phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas// mchod pa
164a1(mdo sde): cung zad byas kyang rgya che nyid 'gyur ba/ / bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis// rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo// thub/
164a2(mdo sde): gsung rnam par brtags na dad pa'i mi skyed pa 'am// phan pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la// tshig btu ba dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba// rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras stsol 'di
164a3(mdo sde): bdag nyung zad cing / / 'di ltar pad+ma kha bya'i dbus gnas bung ba ni// 'khor zhing pad+ma las ni cung zad pa sogs par byed// de bzhin thub pa'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i tshal nang nas// rang yid rab tu
164a4(mdo sde): dga' byed cung zad bsdu bar bya/ / thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba// dang ldan mi la nyin par rgyas par nye 'gro ste// rnam par dpyang na tshigs bcad phyed mtha' mi dpogs
164a5(mdo sde): na/ / rin chen mdo rgyas bsdu ba 'di ni smos ci dgos// phyogs sgo rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab// rab gsal zhes bya sa yi bdag por gyur pa na// bsod nams stobs kyis dgra las
164a6(mdo sde): rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/ / btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhabs gtsang byas// glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrig 'dod chags kyis chags pa// 'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skyab/
164a7(mdo sde): gyur la// gzigs nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nye bar zhi bzhed pas// thugs brtan thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab// de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang
164b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams/ / nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag spel// 'gro la phan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag mdzad// thugs rje cher ldan drang srong
164b2(mdo sde): mchog 'di tshe gzhan du/ / nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad mi skyo ji snyed te// brjod par 'di ni shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang // ngag dag phyir ni cung zad yongs su brjod par bya// stag mo shi ba
164b3(mdo sde): glang po spre'u dka' thub dbang / / tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas// don kun bsgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po che gcig thogs// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan
164b4(mdo sde): gnas su skye ba bzhes/ / der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas// skyabs med g.yo zhing phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la// thugs rje chen pos thugs ni spro ba bskyed
164b5(mdo sde): gyur te/ / gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs rgyur// de bas 'di ni mi yul nye bar rab gshegs te// skye dang rga shin pa'i 'jigs pa gzigs nas ni// rang byung blo gros des mdzad byang
164b6(mdo sde): rmub yang dag brnyes/ / de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams dang
164b7(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas/ / byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pa shin tu chod pa rnams la bugs rjes
165a1(mdo sde): yongs su bskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa/ de bugs la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por yongs su 'khor
165a2(mdo sde): ba na/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / mgo dang / mig dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams gtong ba dang / shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar
165a3(mdo sde): ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang / rtag tu lhod pa med pa'i spro ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang / yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par
165a4(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang ldan pas/ / gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis/ shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs pa'i srog chags rnams la mchog tu snying
165a5(mdo sde): rje bskyed nas/ byams pa'i stobs dang / zla 'od dang / shi bi dang / glang po dang / thams cad sgrol dang / bzod par smra ba dang / spre'u'i bdag po dang / mi bzangs dang / sman chen po la sogs pa skyes
165a6(mdo sde): pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed du smon lam byas shing bsags pa/ / e ma'o kye ma bdag gis 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su 'dren pa med pa/ chos ma yin pa/ 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro ba/
165a7(mdo sde): log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/ sems la mi bzad ba'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/ khro ba mang ba/ lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing rnam par brlag pa/ phrag dog dang / ser snas kun tu bcings
165b1(mdo sde): pa/ legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la/ bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral
165b2(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ / ma grol ba rnams ni bgrol bar bya'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni// yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar
165b3(mdo sde): bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin na/ da ni don dbya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na/ gdul bar nus so gdul
165b4(mdo sde): bar nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgongs nas/ 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/ su ni 'grib/ su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/ su ni gnod par gyur// su ni nyam
165b5(mdo sde): thag par gyur/ su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/ gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbyugs dbyung bar bya// su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la
165b6(mdo sde): 'bab/ / su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam na bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i
165b7(mdo sde): nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs
166a1(mdo sde): su smin par bya/ gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na/ srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni
166a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa bskyed par 'os pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa yongs su smin par nus pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang
166a3(mdo sde): la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang / la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par gzhol ba dang / la la bla na med pa
166a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / la la ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsngags pas rkyen la rag las pa gang zhig ma thos pas/ dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyam/
166a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma'o bdag gi yun ring po nas yang dag par rtog pa rdzogs par gyur cing / nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to//
166a6(mdo sde): zhes dgyes shing ngas bya ba ni byas so// ngas khur bkur ba dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/ gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yun ring por mi thogs par pad+ma'i
166a7(mdo sde): chal yongs su smin cing kha bye lam rig pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur gyis/ phyi ba shol mi bya'o// 'dir gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas
166b1(mdo sde): na/ gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag mi'i 'jig rten du song la/ der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/ 'di rnams skal/
166b2(mdo sde): ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
166b3(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba/ skyabs med pa yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog chags rnams/ dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o// thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes
166b4(mdo sde): su 'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu gdungs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes de lta
166b5(mdo sde): bu'i thugs la dgongs pa brtse ba bskyed nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'jug par mdzad pa na/ rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med de/ gzigs pa rnam lngas gzigs par mdzad
166b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
166b7(mdo sde): rnams rigs ji lta ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i tshigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da ltar
167a1(mdo sde): ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi
167a2(mdo sde): 'gyur bas/ bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang
167a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
167a4(mdo sde): rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs pa mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor
167a5(mdo sde): bi len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba glang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig/
167a6(mdo sde): btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar yin par gzigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / 'bras dang /
167a7(mdo sde): baglang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa dang / spong mo ba brgya 'dub/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po
167b1(mdo sde): btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis
167b2(mdo sde): yul dbus su nyeng mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
167b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ / rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par
167b4(mdo sde): mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta ba zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len
167b5(mdo sde): snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na/ brgyad khri thub pa yan chad/ nying mtshams sbyor mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa brgya phub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi lan no// byang
167b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan tshad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya/
167b7(mdo sde): bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas/ bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs me lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i
168a1(mdo sde): bya/ sdig la ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lba ba'i sdigs ma dang / dus kyi smrigs ma shas rnam yin pas/ bangag la gzhan dag byang chu
168a2(mdo sde): sems dpas snyigs ma lA shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus na smad
168a3(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas// rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs
168a4(mdo sde): ba yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems/
168a5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs nas/ de 'di snyam du
168a6(mdo sde): dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing / mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste/ spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag lo gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rgyud ngan pa
168a7(mdo sde): las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar/ bdag gis rgyal po zas ga tsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas
168b1(mdo sde): thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems
168b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyud la gzigs pa mdzad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgod
168b3(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa//
168b4(mdo sde): rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ khro bag can ma yin pa/ phra ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ rgyud phun sum
168b5(mdo sde): tshetshogs pa/ rigs mtho ba/ nye du'i rigs dang ldan pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa/
168b6(mdo sde): khengs pa med pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
168b7(mdo sde): la/ e ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin pa
169a1(mdo sde): la gzigs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang /
169a2(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel
169a3(mdo sde): babar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas
169a4(mdo sde): kyi sum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar
169a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin
169a6(mdo sde): bas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpas bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i
169a7(mdo sde): ris rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig nga 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de
169b1(mdo sde): bal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug po 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod dang / sA ke ta dang / yangs pa can dang / tsam pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / wA ra NA sir nying mtshams sbyor ba/
169b2(mdo sde): long shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig
169b3(mdo sde): da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu'i ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu'i gling ni rtog ge ba drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrug
169b4(mdo sde): pa lags so/ / de la rtog ge ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srungs rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang // mi pham
169b5(mdo sde): skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnam rdeg dang / bram ze
169b6(mdo sde): bzeng ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi
169b7(mdo sde): bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong nyon mongs med dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ byang chub
