252a7(mdo sde): byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ brtan pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid gtod par gnas
252b1(mdo sde): so/ / gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag sgra dang / kha spu bregs de gos ngur smrig bgos nas ngang pa yang dag
252b2(mdo sde): pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/ bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi
252b3(mdo sde): skye ba zad do/ / tshangs par spyod pas bstan to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so// zhes go bar byed cing / tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
252b4(mdo sde): kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// wA ra NA si na grong migatso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u
252b5(mdo sde): lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste/ grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs
252b6(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas dang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang
252b7(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /
253a1(mdo sde): gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu
253a2(mdo sde): rnams ni re shig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis// ma la bdag cag kyang sgra dang
253a3(mdo sde): kha spu dregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo snyam mo// de nas grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag wA ra NA sir bcom ldan 'das
253a4(mdo sde): gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po bdag gis
253a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byang ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom
253a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/
253a7(mdo sde): de ltar rab tu byung nas/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong
253b1(mdo sde): par gnas pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug cu dang
253b2(mdo sde): drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
253b3(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis// /
253b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing dang la/ khyed gnyis shing ni gcig/
253b5(mdo sde): tum 'gro shig/ nga yang lteng rgyas grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di wA ra NA si'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas
253b6(mdo sde): kyi nags su 'dug nas/ de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston te/ dge slong dag nga ni lnga dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i
253b7(mdo sde): 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer gang na
254a1(mdo sde): bder rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byang du
254a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na// ji ltar bdag
254a3(mdo sde): nyid grol bar sems/ / bdag gis dge sbyong ma grol bas// 'ching ba chen pos bcing pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te 'di lta ste//
254a4(mdo sde): dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyis// 'ching ba gang yin kun las grol// bar chad byed pa khyod
254a5(mdo sde): bcom par/ / sdig can de ltar shes par gyis// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bang
254a6(mdo sde): kha yid la bcags nas/ / de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba
254a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ / dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes
254b1(mdo sde): bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / nga yang lteng rgyas kyis grong khyer gyi sde can gang na ba der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis
254b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wA ra NA sir ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyis grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing
254b3(mdo sde): gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong khyer sde can du byon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ral pa can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing
254b4(mdo sde): zhig gi drung du bsten te/ nyen par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so// de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i cho gas grong khyer snga can gyis phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga'
254b5(mdo sde): bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/ de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na
254b6(mdo sde): par 'dong pa dang / drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dang par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba zhi ba dang dul dang ldan pa/ gser gyi
254b7(mdo sde): mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
255a1(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das cig bud med cig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong / btsun pa 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs
255a2(mdo sde): grong khyer sde can gyis slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid
255a3(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bor nas bdag cag tshol lags so// gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems// bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba
255a4(mdo sde): gang yin pa gang bdam/ btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyid/ bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags de 'dam lags so// gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang / khyed la
255a5(mdo sde): / chos bshad do// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan
255a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi yang dag par stan pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khor bzhin du 'phag
255a7(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang
255b1(mdo sde): chos rig pa dang / chos kyis gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i
255b2(mdo sde): chos rnams la mi 'jig pa thob nas/ stan las khengs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
255b3(mdo sde): gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag
255b4(mdo sde): dag bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
255b5(mdo sde): stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas
255b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas/ snga dron bza' sham parnga mnapas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyom la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong
255b7(mdo sde): khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas grong khyer snga can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs
256a1(mdo sde): te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa/
256a2(mdo sde): na 'dis mar sar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar dngar bas bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stob ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so// grong pa'i bu mo
256a3(mdo sde): dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur
256a4(mdo sde): spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so//
256a5(mdo sde): de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i
256a6(mdo sde): bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ / de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga'
256a7(mdo sde): mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to/ / btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyis mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga'
256b1(mdo sde): stobs ma la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo / / de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhug par rig nas
256b2(mdo sde): gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim
256b3(mdo sde): par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed 'gyur bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod //
256b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzengs bstod/ yang dag
256b5(mdo sde): par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gangadan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te ngas te yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul
256b6(mdo sde): bzang por bkur ba'i dge slong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/ / de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
256b7(mdo sde): can bcas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pad ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par
257a1(mdo sde): bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza na'i chu klung gis 'gram gyis bsti gnas na dkara' thub spyod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te lteng rgyas 'od srungs
257a2(mdo sde): ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu khon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma la ngas steng rgyas
257a3(mdo sde): 'od srungs ral pa can dbang du byas te 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i cho gas chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na pa
257a4(mdo sde): der gshegs so/ / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//
257a5(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/ dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so// dge sbyong chen po yun ring mo zhig lag na gang nas 'khor te 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces
257a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gang na bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu
257a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
257b1(mdo sde): 'od srungs gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyis me khang du nga zhag cig gcig 'dug go// dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod mtho btsam par
257b2(mdo sde): 'gyur du mchi'o/ / 'od srungs re shig gnang bar gyis shig dang / mgo tsam par mi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho mi tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba khor nar bzhugs zhig/ nga nas bcom ldan
257b3(mdo sde): 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis ma khang gang na ba der gshegs te/ byon nas ma khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang
257b4(mdo sde): ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyog par bzhag ste gzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa phyung ngo // bcom ldan
257b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis mthus dud pa phyung ngo / / klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas klu gdug pa khros
257b6(mdo sde): bapa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ma khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ ma lce gcig tu gyur pa sreg par byed do// de nas klu lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
257b7(mdo sde): can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar kun tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma
258a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar mdzes pa/ klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang / kyi hud nyon mong pa bdag gi tshig ma mnyan no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/
258a2(mdo sde): nga lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas chad pa bcad kyis/ ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la
258a3(mdo sde): des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed cing dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phral
258a4(mdo sde): ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mas klu gdug pa'i me zil kyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de dul bar mkhyen
258a5(mdo sde): nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so// lteng rgyas bod srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
258a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig 'od srungs gson no// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srungs klu gdug
258a7(mdo sde): ba gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas brtul nas lhung bzed du gtsug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can
258b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na ltang rgyas
258b2(mdo sde): 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas kyis nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re
258b3(mdo sde): mem thab gsum gsum ste ma thab stong lnga brgya yod do/ / de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na me sbar bar ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams ltang rgyas 'od
258b4(mdo sde): srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su skyong
258b5(mdo sde): par 'tshal na zhugs de sbar bar rngo ma thog lags so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung
258b6(mdo sde): grang snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod
258b7(mdo sde): cig 'dir bdag gi bram ze khye'u lnga brgya tsam ma la yongs su sbyong par 'tshal na/ me de sbar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu
259a1(mdo sde): zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srungs me sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po sngar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / ldanas
259a2(mdo sde): kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag
259a3(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ / de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spung nas/ me bsad par 'dod na/ bsad par ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srungs
259a4(mdo sde): ral pa can gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig dang / 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas
259a5(mdo sde): zhugs 'gum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po// bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig
259a6(mdo sde): ma byung grang snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na nga der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du
259a7(mdo sde): gsol/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhug dgum par 'tshal na/ dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhug
259b1(mdo sde): na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srungs me de bsad dam/ dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis mthu dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus
259b2(mdo sde): me de rang nyid shi'o/ / de nas ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no/
259b3(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang nying me la yongs su skyong par 'dod na sbyar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba'i bar du nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du
259b4(mdo sde): gong ma bzhin no/ / de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas bsang bar 'dod na zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas dus gzhag zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung
259b5(mdo sde): ral pa can gyis me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang gzhan yang
259b6(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad par ma nus so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur
259b7(mdo sde): grang snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du
260a1(mdo sde): gsol/ / dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gis me khang thams cad 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lU gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang
260a2(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims nas zhugs 'gum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na/ dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/ de'i mthu
260a3(mdo sde): zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srungs me de zhi bar bya 'am/ dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang
260a4(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis lha'i mthu ma khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan
260a5(mdo sde): che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po
260a6(mdo sde): bzhi po bdag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lha gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de rnams dpar
260a7(mdo sde): na me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas bsreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te dge sbyong chen po yang
260b1(mdo sde): me la yongs su spyod de/ 'di ltar de de'i spyan snga na/ me'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sregs par byed pa yod do snyam mo// de nas
260b2(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen
260b3(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag ma dang gsum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyis phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar
260b4(mdo sde): te/ me lce gcig tu gyur te bsreg pa bgyid pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de/ de ltar de'i spyan snga na/ me'i phung
260b5(mdo sde): po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas bsreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo// 'od srungs cing me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga ma la yongs su mi
260b6(mdo sde): spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las// sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyis// me 'am yang na chu dag la// yongs rten yon tan ci zhig yod// de lta mod kyis 'dir mang
260b7(mdo sde): gsum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ nga gang na ba der 'ong te lhag nas/ nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar
261a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed par byed pa bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
261a2(mdo sde): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyis dag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lha rnams ngag gi dbang po brgya byin
261a3(mdo sde): kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na ma'i phung po 'bar/ rab tu
261a4(mdo sde): 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po dag pas kyang ches lhag cing 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// ltung rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
261a5(mdo sde): can de nyid kyis mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngun snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan cha mod kyi bdag
261a6(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ / de nas mi mjed kyis bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo bab pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
261a7(mdo sde): byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung po chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur
261b1(mdo sde): nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can de nyid kyis mtshan mo d+ha/
261b2(mdo sde): skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyis bdag kyang dgra bcom pa
261b3(mdo sde): yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ / de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa
261b4(mdo sde): can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i
261b5(mdo sde): gnas yod kyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen
261b6(mdo sde): nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud ngo / / de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan pa skye bo'i
261b7(mdo sde): tshogs chen po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang / 'di snyam du sems de
262a1(mdo sde): zhag bdun po 'di la bdag rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan// skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma da ni
262a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po 'od kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis de la bsod snyoms sbyong du gzhug go snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen nas
262a3(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs gang na ba der gshegs so/ / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
262a4(mdo sde): gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud pa lags/ 'od srungs khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag
262a5(mdo sde): bdun du byed pa la bab nas/ 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phral che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na/ de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyis bdag la
262a6(mdo sde): nide lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas
262a7(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / / 'o na ci'i srad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srungs khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po
262b1(mdo sde): byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung / bdag gis yang de la yong su longs spyod
262b2(mdo sde): du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas da 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad du gsol
262b3(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas
262b4(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po de'i slang du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gi khyed la chos dang mthun pa'i
262b5(mdo sde): 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ / bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas
262b6(mdo sde): g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdug chod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po de'i dus
262b7(mdo sde): lakha bab par dgongs su gsol/ 'od srungs de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas// ji ltar
263a1(mdo sde): thugs mnyam par gzhag nas shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdag pa de las kha dog dang dri zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i sti ma rnams kyis
263a2(mdo sde): lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byon nas ga na bshams pa nyid la
263a3(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ / de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong
263a4(mdo sde): ngo/ mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song
263a5(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thug mnyam par gzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gi 'dzam bu'i gling du btags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang / ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snyem
263a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug kyis gal te 'dod na long spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas ltang rgyas
263a7(mdo sde): 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// shing 'dzam
263b1(mdo sde): bu zhes bya ba gang gi/ 'dzam bu gling du btag pa de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil ba'i nags dang / ka ping tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i nags kyang de bzhin no//
263b2(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te/
263b3(mdo sde): byon nas gangan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu ltung rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'ongs nas/ ltang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyis
263b4(mdo sde): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na
263b5(mdo sde): ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyis gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lus
263b6(mdo sde): lhung bzed bkang nas/ 'dir phyin pa de lta bu ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
263b7(mdo sde): srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
264a1(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsod snyoms pazhes nas/ phyogs gzham zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyis bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus rgya
264a2(mdo sde): dgos pa zhig byung ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
264a3(mdo sde): spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste/ chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do// lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas
264a4(mdo sde): na 'chags na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu 'bab pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas 'bab snyam mo// de nas ltang rgyas 'od srungs
264a5(mdo sde): ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na
264a6(mdo sde): 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chabs gcig mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di dag gang nas 'bab snyam bgyid do//
264a7(mdo sde): 'od srungs 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyis bya ba mdzad pa na/ nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
264b1(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ nga gang na ba der 'ong ste phyin nas nga'i mdun nas lag pas sa la bstun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus
264b2(mdo sde): chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srungs rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che
264b3(mdo sde): ba yin te/ ya mtshan cha mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'bring nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing bu lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der
264b4(mdo sde): gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad de/ rdzing lag pas
264b5(mdo sde): brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo // de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag
264b6(mdo sde): pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / / lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can pasti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas bkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i ya la ga chen po dung ba zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di
264b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dung bar ma gyur na/ ardzu ma'i yal ga chen po 'ding su zhig gis btung snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das
265a1(mdo sde): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing/
265a2(mdo sde): khag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na su zhig gi btud snyam
265a3(mdo sde): bgyid do/ / 'od srungs 'dir phye 'phreng na nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzheng nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu
265a4(mdo sde): na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas/ shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag
265a5(mdo sde): pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dung bar gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srungs 'di ni ardzun lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o//
265a6(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs rakha pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe
265a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams
265b1(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas/ ri brag gcig las rdo leb che ba ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
265b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras ngag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyos phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus
265b3(mdo sde): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i dasha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das
265b4(mdo sde): kyi dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
265b5(mdo sde): 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras ngag bkram mo// ldang rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bsti gnas
265b6(mdo sde): na 'chag pa na rdolab che la ring nga dag mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na/ rdole ba che la ring ba 'ang dag nga su zhog gi khyer te 'ong snyam mo/
265b7(mdo sde): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir
266a1(mdo sde): bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/ rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis
266a2(mdo sde): na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis nyam bgyid do/ / 'od srungs 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag ba rIs so// de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod
266a3(mdo sde): pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang bkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ong te phyin
266a4(mdo sde): nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du
266a5(mdo sde): dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig
266a6(mdo sde): blangs te/ nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i
266a7(mdo sde): sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ / 'od srungs rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar
266b1(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan cha mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na/ lte nga rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti/
266b2(mdo sde): gnas kyi nags tshangs tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe nai rany+dza na'i chu cher brag nas bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i ltung na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag
266b3(mdo sde): pas 'chag par mdzad do/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po
266b4(mdo sde): btsal snyam du bsam nas/ shing cig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i lteng na/
266b5(mdo sde): sa rdul gyi yog pa bla gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srungs gson no//
266b6(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srungs 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i
266b7(mdo sde): gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i glu ji lta bar chu la
267a1(mdo sde): 'jug de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
267a2(mdo sde): ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis sems mkhyen pas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la
267a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'od srungs khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas
267a4(mdo sde): lteste rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong
267a5(mdo sde): chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / snyan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar ngag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
267a6(mdo sde): 'od srungs khyod kyi 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srungs de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'dir khyod lto bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa beshes gnyen can
267a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i
267b1(mdo sde): khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni/ dge slong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spod par spyad na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de
267b2(mdo sde): thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge slong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spong ba spong na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo //
267b3(mdo sde): bram ze'i bye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir ga yang gzhi dang shing shun dang / 'khor ba dang / ril ba'i spyi'u blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du bor shig/ mkhan po
267b4(mdo sde): bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis ga yang gzhi dang shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi'u blugs dang / blug gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du bor nas/ lteng
267b5(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'dir bdag 'di ltar bdag cag gi bdag gis bgyi
267b6(mdo sde): gang lags de bgyis lags so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
267b7(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po bdag gi 'khor la bltas lags te/ bdag legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge sbyong gi dngos po thob pa lta na
268a1(mdo sde): bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa sdud par bgyi'o/ / 'od srungs tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyi tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung
268a2(mdo sde): ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis spun chu klung 'od srungs dang 'od srungs gnyis/ 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang
268a3(mdo sde): / chu klung nai rany+dza na'i 'jug gi 'gram gyis bsti gnas na dka' thub spod do// chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs spun gnyis kyi g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba
268a4(mdo sde): spyi'u blugs dang / blug gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams/ rgyal po 'am chom
268a5(mdo sde): rkun nam me 'am chus nyes ngamig 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag cag gis tshang ba mtshung bar spod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'ong srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs
268a6(mdo sde): s pun dag lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gang na ba der song ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can sba phyi snam sbyar
268a7(mdo sde): bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khord ngo // chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs gis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can
268b1(mdo sde): skra phyi snam sbyar bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la 'di skad ces sbas so//
268b2(mdo sde): 'od srungs 'di mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srungs dag 'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas
268b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni mchog yin zhing chos bshes pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khog gtug pa ma ga d+hA'i
268b4(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod pa byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis
268b5(mdo sde): ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par
268b6(mdo sde): gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spong ba spyang par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la
268b7(mdo sde): bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srungs dag de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grag po dang ldan pa/ bshes gnyen can dag gis ni 'a
269a1(mdo sde): la blta ba legs pa yin no/ / de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs spun rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces
269a2(mdo sde): smras so/ / bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spun sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba
269a3(mdo sde): de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung
269a4(mdo sde): ngobram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus nga yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srungs dang / ga ya 'od srungs spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan
269a5(mdo sde): 'das gang na ba der dor ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag lag par gsu
269a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spang bar bgyi'o// 'od srungs dag
269a7(mdo sde): chutshur shog/ tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang // des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom
269b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de dag rab tu byung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyis bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te
269b2(mdo sde): rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yar byon nas ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi sa ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das
269b3(mdo sde): kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'dom par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod kyi cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo// de la bcom ldan
269b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na nyid kyi gdan gyis nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang
269b5(mdo sde): la sngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
269b6(mdo sde): pabar mdzad do/ / me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad // 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang
269b7(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston pa mdzad de/ sku'i smang nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stong
270a1(mdo sde): las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'beb par mdzad do/ / sku'i sdod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i slad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
270a2(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phru
270a3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom
270a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtogs shig
270a5(mdo sde): 'do ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spang shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te/
270a6(mdo sde): gnos shig ces smra ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong 'di thams cad
270a7(mdo sde): ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ / dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gis rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa
270b1(mdo sde): kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de
270b2(mdo sde): yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ / dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyis rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba
270b3(mdo sde): yin zhing / yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba
270b4(mdo sde): yin no/ / gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
270b5(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul yin
270b6(mdo sde): no/ / chos kyis rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga
270b7(mdo sde): ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa khur bor ba/ rang gi don
271a1(mdo sde): rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// rgyal
271a2(mdo sde): bopo gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu gang ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi rang
271a3(mdo sde): pab zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir
271a4(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba/ rin po che sna 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin
271a5(mdo sde): poche dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud meng rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' brtul phong pa
271a6(mdo sde): yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa// de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par// gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon
271a7(mdo sde): gyis bda' ba med la/ / chos dang mthun zhing snyom pas legs par nga ba ste/ gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
271b1(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grag par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i
271b2(mdo sde): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzug can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i
271b3(mdo sde): yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung
271b4(mdo sde): bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / lha de khum shig/ lta bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bo 'gyur du mchi'o// grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu gangs re'o ngos zhes
271b5(mdo sde): bya ba nas grag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ / lha de khum shig/ lta bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra shig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong pa
271b6(mdo sde): dag shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
271b7(mdo sde): bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par
272a1(mdo sde): grags par gyur na/ de'i nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ga ng+gA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/
272a2(mdo sde): smon pa'i gzhi la smon par byed de/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
272a3(mdo sde): pabar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye
272a4(mdo sde): bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang
272a5(mdo sde): bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo spangs gzugs can snying po steng
272a6(mdo sde): gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi la smon par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
