278b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal
278b7(mdo sde): 'gag ste/ rgyu bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas/ 'gag pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// dge slong dag de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
279a1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/ de ni sil bar gyur pa de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas 'di yin te/ 'di lta/
279a2(mdo sde): ste/ phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gag pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzug
279a3(mdo sde): can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin/
279a4(mdo sde): nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'byung ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni/
279a5(mdo sde): bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
279a6(mdo sde): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/ sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so//
279a7(mdo sde): mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas
279b1(mdo sde): len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung / 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am
279b2(mdo sde): phyi'i 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag zag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di
279b3(mdo sde): ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gang ci yang
279b4(mdo sde): rung ba dang / rnam par shes pa gang yi ci yang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am// ngan pa 'am/
279b5(mdo sde): gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes
279b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis li lta ba bzhin du lta bar bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos bos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang /
279b7(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//
280a1(mdo sde): rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bsten to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
280a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo srungs gzugs can snying po dang lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma
280a3(mdo sde): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa
280a4(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i
280a5(mdo sde): chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbar pa btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
280a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su
280a7(mdo sde): mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom
280b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang // gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams
280b2(mdo sde): kyis/ bsnyen bkur bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang ma
280b3(mdo sde): gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
280b4(mdo sde): phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / rgyal po'i khab du byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa
280b5(mdo sde): na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes nas ring por ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang / de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang / pang nas
280b6(mdo sde): skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshogs su sdud pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang yin pa da / yongs su 'dren pa na de gnyis gyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis bdud rtsi sngar rnyed pa des gcig la
280b7(mdo sde): gcig smra bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar byas so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad blta ba dang /
281a1(mdo sde): rnam par blta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs so//
281a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na kun tu rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad blta ba dang / rnam par blta ba dang / bskum pa dang
281a3(mdo sde): brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i kha' na/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/
281a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed lhags shing gnas pa dag 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gi sngon chang 'ga' yang ma mthong gis ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste
281a5(mdo sde): dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rigs nas/ lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang / ldog pas shas che
281a6(mdo sde): sdo cing 'dug go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas kun tu rgyu ni rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul la 'di skad ces smras so//
281a7(mdo sde): dge slong khyod kyi ston pa gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung / su'i chos la ni dga'// tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i chos kyi dge slong go'u ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos du
281b1(mdo sde): smig dag bgos te dang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kho bo'i
281b2(mdo sde): ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no/ / kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo // kho bo de'i chos la dga'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni gzhon pa dang rab tu byung ba gsar
281b3(mdo sde): bas/ de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nges bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di
281b4(mdo sde): ltar des bstan par bya'o/ / dge slong kho bo la ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin tu mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su
281b5(mdo sde): bcad pas smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge slong che//
281b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang
281b7(mdo sde): chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang // som nyi las rgal ba dang // the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang // ston pas
282a1(mdo sde): bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pas/ ro stong bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
282a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sngon chang ma mthong ma thos pa'i// 'chi meng mya ngan med pa yi// go 'phang 'dra
282a3(mdo sde): la rjes su rtogs/ / tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal ka lan ta ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal
282a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis sbas pa la mngon par bstod pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ta dum la lan
282a5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te song nas/ kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo // kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nya rgyal thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kun tu rgya nya rgyal
282a6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dngas/ bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ lpags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na/ khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed
282a7(mdo sde): dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig/ de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang
282b1(mdo sde): de 'gog gang yin pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsa to// de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che// tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan gcig rjod cig/ tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o//
282b2(mdo sde): chos rnams gang dag rgyu khas byung ba dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu nga nas skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri
282b3(mdo sde): ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / de nas kun tu rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las
282b4(mdo sde): rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas// ro stong bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ kun tu nye rgyal ga la ba
282b5(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i//
282b6(mdo sde): 'chi med mya ngan meng po yi// go 'phang 'dil rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'ong ma'i tshal ka lan ta ka'i gnas
282b7(mdo sde): 'di nyir na'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa chur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par sbyong ba srung bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir rje 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa
283a1(mdo sde): ldan pa shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no/ / de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze
283a2(mdo sde): khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na/ khyed cag ji ltar byed/ mkhan po ga'is bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang
283a3(mdo sde): lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis la brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis
283a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung bar bgyi'o/ / bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shis// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu
283a5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu nye rgyal
283a6(mdo sde): dang bang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho na nas gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa
283a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis mdun nas 'ongs pa 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo // 'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung gi mchog dang / zung bzang por gyur te/
283b1(mdo sde): gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyis chog tu 'gyur la/ cig sho ni shes pa nga ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// denas ngan slong nigags rab gyi tshigs su bcangad bzlas pa
283b2(mdo sde): dgos yul mtha' yas pa/ / skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon// bcom ldan srid pa mamang mdzad pa// grags pa nye rgyal pang nas skyes// 'od ma'i tshal dus phyin par//
283b3(mdo sde): ba gzigs gyur nas// tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni// 'di gnyis pa yi nyan thos kyi// zung mchog 'gyur zhes ngas bstan te// gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog/ tshig shos shes
283b4(mdo sde): ldan pa yi/ / mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
283b5(mdo sde): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par
283b6(mdo sde): dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyang par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing
283b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar/ skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ log na lhung bzed
284a1(mdo sde): thogs pa/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
284a2(mdo sde): pas tshur shog bka' stsal pa/ / skra byi rnam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// de nas dge slong
284a3(mdo sde): rab tu mang po ngag snga dro sham thabs gos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu
284a4(mdo sde): stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su
284a5(mdo sde): bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid nas// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya// des dge slong
284a6(mdo sde): rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro bsod snyoms
284a7(mdo sde): mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
284b1(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
284b2(mdo sde): btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi
284b3(mdo sde): mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis/ dge slong de dang de
284b4(mdo sde): ngag mthong nas cho 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ phyin chad ci zhig bkri
284b5(mdo sde): bar bya/ / zhes mchi nas nges bdag cag rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po'i khab
284b6(mdo sde): kyi mi di skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed//
284b7(mdo sde): ces brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag
285a1(mdo sde): sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos bogs te/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu
285a2(mdo sde): stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu byung zhing bsten par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas/ yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis// dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad/
285a3(mdo sde): pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gis// grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya// de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe
285a4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyi khring mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig bzong mi byed// de skad ces smras pa/
285a5(mdo sde): dang rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
285a6(mdo sde): 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lnga dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/
285a7(mdo sde): khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byed do zhes spring ba/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang gtang ba de dang
285b1(mdo sde): de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid rab tu byung bar gyur to/ / rgyal po zal gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya gang dang gang gtang ba de dang de dag de nyid du legs par gsungs pa
285b2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa// lha khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang
285b3(mdo sde): gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las// de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes
285b4(mdo sde): smra'o/ / da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na/ ji ltar sems khongs su chung bar mi 'gyur// 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchis te/ bka' mching 'tshal
285b5(mdo sde): kha slar mchi'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa// 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang sngon de nying du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i
285b6(mdo sde): gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ / 'char kas smras pa/ lnga slar mchi lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su// khyod
285b7(mdo sde): ni gang gis cher bskrun te/ / nyon mongs ma rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal ba ljon shing la bsdad na// de ni khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lcug ma 'phel bar 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde bas
286a1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur/ / bdag ni sdug bsngal skal bar ldan// gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas
286a2(mdo sde): bskrun bskrun te/ / bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pa thob gyur na// de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje me// gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na// nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni//
286a3(mdo sde): shin tu che dang phan gdags zhes// khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad nas ni// khyod kyi zhi gnas de brnyed na// bdag dang gnyis kyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtse rjes su bzung mdzod de// gshegs
286a4(mdo sde): par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ / zhes spring ba'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
286a5(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ spring yig lags so zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklags so// bklags nas yi
286a6(mdo sde): ga mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dong ngo // 'char ka sngon bcom ldan
286a7(mdo sde): 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/ de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dam/ bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba
286b1(mdo sde): 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi
286b2(mdo sde): yis bkri/ / gang zhig yul gyi rgya mor ma chags shing // sreng 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mngang // gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yi bkri// gang zhig
286b3(mdo sde): bcom nas brtsegs pa meng gyur cig/ 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// lan la spobs pa med
286b4(mdo sde): nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba
286b5(mdo sde): zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis/ khyod kyang rab tu byung shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la slar mchi bar dam bcas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
286b6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang /
286b7(mdo sde): slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang mthun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas/ 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu byung lags so//
287a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/ btsun
287a2(mdo sde): pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas
287a3(mdo sde): 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ dang phan chad bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa
287a4(mdo sde): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
287a5(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod mong kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgor sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'angs
287a6(mdo sde): so zhes brjod par bya'o/ / gal te nang du skyon cig zer na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang byon nam zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams
287a7(mdo sde): cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'drin/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams
287b1(mdo sde): cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes 'drin/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'drin dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod
287b2(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyis rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/ byon no zhes
287b3(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o/ / ji srid cig na byon zhes 'drin zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
287b4(mdo sde): song shig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te// lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub// bcom ldan
287b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pa nga rgyal po'i
287b6(mdo sde): khab kyi sgor bsdang nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do//
287b7(mdo sde): dernams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du bong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/
288a1(mdo sde): lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsa/
288a2(mdo sde): pa nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag cag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud nas/ stan bshams pa nyid la
288a3(mdo sde): 'dug tu badrug ste/ de'i don tu chu btsags pa dang / 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji srid
288a4(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa'i cho ga yongs su longs spyod do/ / rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te/ smras pa// 'char ka ci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam
288a5(mdo sde): 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul po dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper dzi lta buM/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang mig rjes bzhin no// nyim dang srin bu ma
288a6(mdo sde): khyer bzhin no/ / nam mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byang 'di 'dra'am
288a7(mdo sde): lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon
288b1(mdo sde): nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha byon no// dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis
288b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa
288b3(mdo sde): 'am gtsug lag khang du'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas
288b4(mdo sde): rgyal po sa blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brtsig tu chug shig/ lha bka'
288b5(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsa cig brtsig tu
288b6(mdo sde): bcug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal te/ mo'u 'bal gyi du song la/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshes
288b7(mdo sde): te/ yab sras gangan 'jom na/ khyod cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos bcom
289a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te// yab sras gdan 'dzem na/ khyed cag las
289a2(mdo sde): su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs
289a3(mdo sde): phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba// mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/
289a4(mdo sde): khyu mchog pa lang gis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu// seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis
289a5(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu// bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis
289a6(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyis rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los
289a7(mdo sde): gyusbyar ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la ba 'phags
289b1(mdo sde): bo grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam pos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis
289b2(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mcho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu
289b3(mdo sde): glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byangad bzang po brgyad cus
289b4(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhags pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
289b5(mdo sde): dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig 'bab chu ro hi ti kar byon no// rgyal po zas gtsang
289b6(mdo sde): gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ang ba chu ro shi ta kar byon no zhes thos so/ / bos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang / gsegs ma rnams pas la nas
289b7(mdo sde): nadan gyi chus chag chag bta/ dri shin tu nim pa pog par ge bar bshams/ rang kyis chus 'phyang mang po dbyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro tsa ta ka nas gang yang n+ya grona'i kun dga'
290a1(mdo sde): de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go// de na 'bab chu ro hi ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni
290a2(mdo sde): lag pa 'khru bar byed do/ / kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// sar skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so/
290a3(mdo sde): zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyis dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro dA'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyis zhabs la
290a4(mdo sde): phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la byang ba blta'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkya
290a5(mdo sde): nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi gnas su gshegs pa nas/ ltog po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zha 'bring byas nas
290a6(mdo sde): steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te/ des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes/ ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro snyams nas
290a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chags pa dang
290b1(mdo sde): bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
290b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad dang 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / la brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag
290b3(mdo sde): go/ cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i slad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stong chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stong nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu
290b4(mdo sde): glang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la ji lta bar/ lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir
290b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o//
290b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das drug gi sring tsam na ni// dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni// dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das pachi
290b7(mdo sde): srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi sring tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi sring tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi sring
291a1(mdo sde): dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug
291a2(mdo sde): gis srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams

291a4(mdo sde): na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das
291a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
291a6(mdo sde): 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags/ 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed don ni kun tu ston mdzad
291a7(mdo sde): lags/ 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med btsal ba chos kyis dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po
291b1(mdo sde): zas gtsang gis lus btungad nas zhabs la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltams pa'i
291b2(mdo sde): tshe na sa ni ga yos pa dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma skra las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras
291b3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa skyed do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag da gdong kho bos gzhon
291b4(mdo sde): nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltams pa na// sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos
291b5(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyis snang ba nyams su myong ba gang yin
291b6(mdo sde): bde yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir
291b7(mdo sde): skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes ji shes par gyur ba de'i tshe yang khe ngas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gis che gzhon nu ngen
292a1(mdo sde): thams cad grub pa zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben
292a2(mdo sde): pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dpa' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsams gtan dang po bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar
292a3(mdo sde): phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab kyang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des/
292a4(mdo sde): kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas nas 'di skad ces/ blo gros
292a5(mdo sde): yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ kun span zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma skra las ma 'das pa'o// zhes smras so//
292a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs
292a7(mdo sde): so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas
292b1(mdo sde): rnams las/ / yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// ji lta bur ni 'ba' shig bzhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
292b2(mdo sde): mi yi bdag po gang du ni/ / khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa// ba so /
292b3(mdo sde): gsar gyis rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba bting ba yi// khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las// bting ba la ni ji ltar mna'// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam
292b4(mdo sde): grol gnas mal ni/ / dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang
292b5(mdo sde): na/ glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// tsher mar bcas pa'i sa bzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul
292b6(mdo sde): rkang / yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis// sa kun rnam par rgyun na yang // nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'o//
292b7(mdo sde): na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa la// ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes
293a1(mdo sde): @nga yi bgo basmras sbyar te/ / de mgos bub bzhi ba rnams// nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di lta ba khyod tsa
293a2(mdo sde): gser gyi gzhong pa nas/ / du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis
293a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi srid pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par byung dang mnyam par gzhag ldan pa'i// nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jig rten kun la snying brtse'i phyir
293a4(mdo sde): spyo do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i// rgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na// rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i// chab ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/
293a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang 'thungs na// bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa// chab kyi ro mchog nga 'thung ngo // rgyal po zas
293a6(mdo sde): gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang // khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs// da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa/ blo bzangs ji
293a7(mdo sde): ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa// dri ma dag chags bcas par yang spangs pas// nga ni mya ngan 'jigs
293b1(mdo sde): pa med gnas te/ / nga la 'di na 'jigs pa cung zad med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ongs par// khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na
293b2(mdo sde): gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ / thub dbang de ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug
293b3(mdo sde): ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ / de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser
293b4(mdo sde): dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ / rnyog pa can la dri nga ba// chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go'u ta ma dang pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med
293b5(mdo sde): bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ / de la rig pa'i yon tan mis bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo
293b6(mdo sde): khyod sngon ser skya mi/ tsan dan gyis ni zhu bkrus shing // ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzab pa las// de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrim
293b7(mdo sde): nga yi rgyan yin te/ / tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs skyes nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod //
294a1(mdo sde): gang las 'jigs su rung ba skye/ yid byung ba yang gang las skyes// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis nga mi byang gsod dang /
294a2(mdo sde): gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang // gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod min na// nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// /
294a3(mdo sde): yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad
294a4(mdo sde): kyis/ ji lta bar yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dang pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni// thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bde bar gshegs
294a5(mdo sde): la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo//
294a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos
294a7(mdo sde): pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so// lha sbyin nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa nges bden pa
294b1(mdo sde): mthong bar ma byas pas/ khrobs kun nas dbris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal nga rangs sapa'ang 'dra da'i rnams dbang du byed bar shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten bams cad dbang nga/
294b2(mdo sde): bya ba zhig/ de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gi smras pa/ lce sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig/ ces bzlogs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/
294b3(mdo sde): tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri drug steng gis rgyun tu zhugs
294b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ / ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma
294b5(mdo sde): gtogs par bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na/ lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha
294b6(mdo sde): cig gis ni nyan thos kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyis byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// kha cig
294b7(mdo sde): gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs
295a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag pa
295a2(mdo sde): cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar
295a3(mdo sde): bcas pas mchod pa dang rjed pa dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ da lta ni mos mchod kyis lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po
295a4(mdo sde): sgra mchog dam chos kyis/ / char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzod de/ mi bzang lam du lhung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyor bar mdzod// rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du
295a5(mdo sde): bdag gi bu 'ba' shig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go// rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar
295a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba gnyis slong du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas bcom
295a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
295b1(mdo sde): thos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po bas gtsang gal ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi brgyad ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ched pa ldan
295b2(mdo sde): pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan
295b3(mdo sde): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam
295b4(mdo sde): bar bzhag na/ rang gis stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba
295b5(mdo sde): dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po'i
295b6(mdo sde): lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/ 'di ltani// sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul
295b7(mdo sde): zung du yang ston par byed do/ / lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi spong nas 'bar bar byed la lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun
296a1(mdo sde): 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs
296a2(mdo sde): bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te/ stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
296a3(mdo sde): bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen
296a4(mdo sde): po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang // sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang // zag zad dgra bcom gang yin pa// thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis//
296a5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bu 'ba' shig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas
296a6(mdo sde): de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ / skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na
296a7(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor dag la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyi sems
296b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par gyur na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gis tshe/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos
296b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis lta ci smos/ srog chags grog zur rnams kyis lha ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams
296b3(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par
296b4(mdo sde): bzhed do snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna
296b5(mdo sde): bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gad na sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang po zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'
296b6(mdo sde): rabar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to/ / de la rgyal po chen po ba ni sgo bzhi nas 'khod pa ni/ yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi gzang dang /
296b7(mdo sde): lus ngan po ste/ shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdub 'khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// lha'i rgyan thams cad
297a1(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa'o/ / nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas ldamam
297a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la
297a3(mdo sde): sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang
297a4(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang
297a5(mdo sde): la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go/ / ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug
297a6(mdo sde): tu mi dbang ngo / / bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgyal po bdag ni yul 'khor sbyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho skar song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas spras
297a7(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags
297b1(mdo sde): skyes po'o/ / ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po
297b2(mdo sde): mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po
297b3(mdo sde): chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo / / ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chang de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang /
297b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis pus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa
297b5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyis bu'o/ / ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha 'khor dag pa la chos 'chang de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das
297b6(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/ bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
297b7(mdo sde): pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/ khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das
298a1(mdo sde): @#kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pade shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // mthong nas
298a2(mdo sde): kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang
298a3(mdo sde): bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jig tshogs
298a4(mdo sde): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du rjod pa ched du brjod pa/
298a5(mdo sde): btsun pa phas ma bgyis mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang
298a6(mdo sde): rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi
298a7(mdo sde): sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag go// yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa// dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang // khyod kyis
298b1(mdo sde): bdag la mdzad lags te/ / sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las// drangs te mtho ris thar pa la// bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lagra ste/
298b2(mdo sde): khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa lags// mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni// bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar// mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yi// longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad// de nas
298b3(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs ste/ bla gos phrags pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
298b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gis dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la

298b6(mdo sde): kyi spyan snga nas chas te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu rgyal srid thod kyis khyer cig/ ci'i slad du/ dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
298b7(mdo sde): bangon pa mthong bas so/ / gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gis nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma 'dreshA kya 'dum bri 'dun spong
299a1(mdo sde): dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ / de bzhin du bre bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis tshe
299a2(mdo sde): tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang lhan cig bden pa zong lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal sring khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa
299a3(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang gang gis tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so// gal te de ltar gyur na su zhig
299a4(mdo sde): rgyal srid la gzhag/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzangs ldan gyis bgyi'o zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyis dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro// de nas rgyal po zas
299a5(mdo sde): gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas/ nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spun 'dren gyis
299a6(mdo sde): dus chod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod lags na// da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnam
299a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong gis chog kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis bka sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
299b1(mdo sde): gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang
299b2(mdo sde): gis lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te/
299b3(mdo sde): lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ gser gyis bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab phul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ yon sngo bar mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bsod
299b4(mdo sde): nams gang yin 'dis/ / shAkya rnams kyi bsams pa yi// yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni// rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
299b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du bsam gtan pa rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma
299b6(mdo sde): gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo// rgyal po zas gtsang gi ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams sbyor lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/

300a2(mdo sde): shAkya thams cad sogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur
300a3(mdo sde): g.yog bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig/ ci thams cad ngam
300a4(mdo sde): khyim re re nas re re'o/ / bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim
300a5(mdo sde): re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/ / bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming chen no// ming chan ni zhing blas kyis mtha' la lhag par brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni
300a6(mdo sde): steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// ming chen la mas smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya
300a7(mdo sde): rnams las khyim re re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung
300b1(mdo sde): shig dbu bsod nams kyi dbang bang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dab dbang chen po can lags mod/ de ring la cung zad kyang ma bskul
300b2(mdo sde): dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro// bu de bzhin du byas te/ yid ches par bya'o// des gzab stong pa rje'us bkang nas kha ras dkar po dkris te
300b3(mdo sde): rgyaskyegs la rgyas btab nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te den ci yod ces 'dri ba dang / ci yang ma mchis so zhes smos shig/ nges de khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams
300b4(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de/ deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya
300b5(mdo sde): de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes rdze'u de rnams sran tshong dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na mngag gzhug mas der khyer na sa ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /

300b7(mdo sde): 'di na ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis/ re shig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang / skyed mos tshal thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas
301a1(mdo sde): ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so/ / de ma la gus pa yin pa des ma las zas kyi phung bskur nas spring ba/ nu ma gdugs chod re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes
301a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa 'di lta bu bskur ba'i rigs so/ / des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so// khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams
301a3(mdo sde): kyis dbang thang chen po'i sems can mi'i bskal pa bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ yum de bsod nams kyis dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung // mi ldan
301a4(mdo sde): yang rung / bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung bar khas len du ma btub bo// de nas nges ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrog tu bcu
301a5(mdo sde): pa shAkya rnams la khyim re re nas re ri rab tu byung shig ces bsgo na/ / khyod ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug/ des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis
301a6(mdo sde): khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob par

301b1(mdo sde): de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas/ de bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rab tu 'byung ngo // nges smras pa/ bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ ma 'gags

304a1(mdo sde): phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na/ mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so// de yang de rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dong zhe na ches pas sems can
