304a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na// skra 'dreg par gtang nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po
304b1(mdo sde): bzang ldan gyi sgra 'dreg pa na/ de ngom zum gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag cing / skad 'dzer cing dbugs rtsegs bro sgra 'dreg par byed do// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir
304b2(mdo sde): dude snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dngal bus tshig re re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa mi phal pa/ rnams la yang bskor bkur bgyid par
304b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta zhig khyed kyis spangs te/ gson pas ni gum mi bsngo'o// shAkya'i rgyal po bzad ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/ chog gis mya ngan ma
304b4(mdo sde): byed cig/ ngas ji ltar mi phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon
304b5(mdo sde): nuchudrungag nyon cig/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur sti byas la/ bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen tu ras kyi steng du zhog shig/ de rnams kyis
304b6(mdo sde): se mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / da pung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sog pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du dung po chen por spungs so//
304b7(mdo sde): nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra bregs te/ de rnams khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa re shig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tsho la bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang
305a1(mdo sde): bang mdzod kyis kyang rgyas pa yang spangs nas/ rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma
305a2(mdo sde): skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam
305a3(mdo sde): mo/ / 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsus mtshan lan gsum/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed
305a4(mdo sde): bas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste/ byin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di
305a5(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ / nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir/ da ltar
305a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin
305a7(mdo sde): pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag
305b1(mdo sde): par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang
305b2(mdo sde): po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rogs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin// rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni
305b3(mdo sde): sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni// rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad// 'das nas yun ring lon pa yi// las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad// gal te legs par gsung
305b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po 'dong na tshur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// des khas
305b5(mdo sde): blangs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
305b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags
305b7(mdo sde): na/ thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsom/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong tshur
306a1(mdo sde): shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mong kho nar skra byib dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma dum gyis
306a2(mdo sde): 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyed nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsten par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur
306a3(mdo sde): shog bka' stsal pas/ sgra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mo la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnam
306a4(mdo sde): nirgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so// de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa// bcom
306a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdud pa bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin
306a6(mdo sde): te/ 'di rgan gyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa cho ga la bud cig/ des de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos
306a7(mdo sde): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'
306b1(mdo sde): dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma' bar gyur to// de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gtugs so// lha sbyin gyis ma btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
306b2(mdo sde): du nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis thung cig/ des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes de 'dud du ma btub ste/ der thog mar bcom
306b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bka' lha sbyin gyis bcag go/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun
306b4(mdo sde): khang du tshogs shing / 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin// rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
306b5(mdo sde): rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
306b6(mdo sde): rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyis sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/
306b7(mdo sde): pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lpags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la rdzi
307a1(mdo sde): skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/ / de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
307a2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser
307a3(mdo sde): skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas/ bar skabs kyi bka' mchod 'di lta bu dag glang ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/
307a4(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin// gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci
307a5(mdo sde): zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes// thog ma ni gang yin// rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
307a6(mdo sde): rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das
307a7(mdo sde): kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang
307b1(mdo sde): las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyu ni ci lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
307b2(mdo sde): rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid bstod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i
307b3(mdo sde): gnas 'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyu las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du
307b4(mdo sde): 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu nga ro rgyab spungs pas re shig de bsal gyis/ khyod kyis shAkya
307b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas
307b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chung nas/ snam sbyar blta ba ste phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pas phab ste zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas
307b7(mdo sde): snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems
308a1(mdo sde): ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu gang yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
308a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
308a3(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams
308a4(mdo sde): kyi sngon gyi rigs ni gang yin pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi
308a5(mdo sde): bu chen pos/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig na// sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na
308a6(mdo sde): yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam
308a7(mdo sde): mkha' la'i'agro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyi tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig tu 'gyur zhing mchogacig tu 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di chu 'ba'
308b1(mdo sde): shig gi mcho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// dper na 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa
308b2(mdo sde): dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig gis mcho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// sa'i
308b3(mdo sde): bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing / kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na mar sar lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang
308b4(mdo sde): rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ / go'u ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na// de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad/ las zad / bsod
308b5(mdo sde): nam zad nas/ 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa 'ong zhing / de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams
308b6(mdo sde): shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing / kha dog bzang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring
308b7(mdo sde): zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe nyi ma dang / zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste// rgyu skar rnams kyang med skad cig dang thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yang
309a1(mdo sde): med/ zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do// skyes pa dang / bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na sems can
309a2(mdo sde): sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ / de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do//
309a3(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la
309a4(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rims gyi za ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcur myang bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar srad do//
309a5(mdo sde): ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcung la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang pa dang / lci bzhugs par
309a6(mdo sde): gyur to/ / de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// go'u tam dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba
309a7(mdo sde): gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten
309b1(mdo sde): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de rnams de za zhing / zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
309b2(mdo sde): kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni
309b3(mdo sde): kha dog dang ldan no/ / khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no// zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod ngo // kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcung nu
309b4(mdo sde): pabar gyur to/ / go'u ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar
309b5(mdo sde): mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas/ 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du/ sems can de rnams sa'i bcu
309b6(mdo sde): nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hung bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes
309b7(mdo sde): de'i don ni mi shes so/ / go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcu nga nub pa na/ sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o//
310a1(mdo sde): ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung ngu za ba
310a2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ / kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod
310a3(mdo sde): pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de
310a4(mdo sde): ngag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag nub par gyur to/ / go'u ta ma dag sa zhag de nub par gyur pa na/ sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/
310a5(mdo sde): mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba 'ga' shig gis reg pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas// 'di skad ces
310a6(mdo sde): a ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud zhes smra ba de bzhin du/ sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang /
310a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum
310b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / kha dog 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o// ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi
310b2(mdo sde): btsir ba lta bu'o/ / de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur to// kha zas la chas
310b3(mdo sde): mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/ / zas kyi tshad gnyis la bsten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/
310b4(mdo sde): khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsong bar byed do// kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blang ba'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par
310b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ / go'u ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas par song mdun nas par song zhes smra zhing sde sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug
310b6(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur to/ / dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' shig la drag po'i tsher gcod par 'dod pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song
310b7(mdo sde): mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang / tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas par song mdun nas par song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la
311a1(mdo sde): mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so// go'u ta ma dag sems can de
311a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bras bu tshen bzhi pa/ phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing
311a3(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no// de rnams de za zhing de za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so//
311a4(mdo sde): gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur to// kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o//
311a5(mdo sde): kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o// de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta'o// ji lta ji ltar
311a6(mdo sde): gcig la gcig mig mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/ / ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen to// ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so// sems can gzhan dag
311a7(mdo sde): gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sa dang bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo gtor nas 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin
311b1(mdo sde): 'byed do/ / sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kra ye sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o// dper na/ da ltar gyi mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na
311b2(mdo sde): phye ma dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du/ sems can rnams kyis sems can log par zhugs pa mthong ba na/
311b3(mdo sde): sas gtor cing bong ba dang / gsag ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas/ 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed
311b4(mdo sde): kyis/ kA ye sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do// go'u ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par
311b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod do/ / 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do// de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa
311b6(mdo sde): nas/ zhag gnyis dang gsum dang / bdun du yang spangs so// gang na sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de rnams khang pa rtsig
311b7(mdo sde): ba la brtson par byed de/ 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa skyong ngo // 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyod do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ go'u tam dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang
312a1(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/ / de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no//
312a2(mdo sde): de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka/ nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sa lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do// de nas sems can snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par
312a3(mdo sde): gyis lu nub blangs so/ / de nas sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can dag khyod tshur sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo // de nas sems can
312a4(mdo sde): des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye sems can khyod rang gi sa lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni nang par gyi sa lu nub blangs so// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs
312a5(mdo sde): so/ / kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum dang / zhag bdun
312a6(mdo sde): gyi bar gyi sa lu blangs so/ / de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshu sa lu'i phyir 'dong ngo // de nas sems can des de la 'di skad ces
312a7(mdo sde): smras so/ / kye sems can khyod rang gis lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyis lu blangs zin no// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems
312b1(mdo sde): te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sa lu blang ngo snyam nas des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sa lu blangs so// gang nas
312b2(mdo sde): sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru sog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu dub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to//
312b3(mdo sde): brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sa lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas/ shes
312b4(mdo sde): ldan dag bdag cag la sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas
312b5(mdo sde): ba/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyi tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag la sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa
312b6(mdo sde): ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gis sa'i bcud la/ kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag gi lus
312b7(mdo sde): la thub pa nyid dang / lci ba nyid zhugs par gyur to// kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring
313a1(mdo sde): zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/ / bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung ngu za ba yin pa de ni kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan
313a2(mdo sde): par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kA ye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa
313a3(mdo sde): yin no zhes sems can gyi sems can la khyang du gsod par byed do/ / bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par
313a4(mdo sde): gyur to/ / sa'i bcud de nub pa na sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing / de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas
313a5(mdo sde): so/ / bdag cag las kha zas ches chung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas/ kha dog gi rnam pa
313a6(mdo sde): gnyis mngon no/ / kha dog rnam par gnyis yod pas kA ye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi
313a7(mdo sde): mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/ / sa zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa// ro phun sum tshogs
313b1(mdo sde): pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la/ tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du
313b2(mdo sde): za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa ye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can
313b3(mdo sde): gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ / bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na/
313b4(mdo sde): ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa/ phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin
313b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur bas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i
313b6(mdo sde): 'bras sa lu'i 'bru sog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sa lu de'i 'bras bu bub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// brngas shing brngas na yang slar mi skye bas brngas par
313b7(mdo sde): yang mngon la sa lu yang sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te/ mtshams bcang la/ 'di ni khyod kyi'o// 'di ni nga'i'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs
314a1(mdo sde): shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te/ mtshams su mu thugs bres so// go'ungam dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug 'dri ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin na//
314a2(mdo sde): de yang chos kyis yin gyi cho ma yin pas ni ma yin pas/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi mtsho yin no// de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par blang
314a3(mdo sde): so/ / sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kra ye sems can khyod rang
314a4(mdo sde): gis lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes de par drangs tshur drangs nas/ ji tsam na 'khor mi'i nang du khrid de shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar
314a5(mdo sde): du gzhan gyis lu ma byin par len to zhes spyos so/ / de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa ya sems can khyod rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi
314a6(mdo sde): sa lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa ye sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag sems can 'dis
314a7(mdo sde): bdag sa lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs te ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spos so/ / de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kA ye sems can khyod kyis sems can
314b1(mdo sde): las lu'i phyir bar drangs chur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang srung nas ci'i phyir spyos/ kwa ye sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems
314b2(mdo sde): teshes ldan dgas su'i phyir bar 'dren tshur 'dzin cing ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du skyo ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba
314b3(mdo sde): lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes la/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang nges bdag cag chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams
314b4(mdo sde): ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te// bdag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam
314b5(mdo sde): nas/ de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/ de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing
314b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'di skad ces kyi sems can khyod tshur shog/ kho bo cag las chad pas bcad par bya ba rnams ni chad pas chod cig/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams ni phan thogs
314b7(mdo sde): shig/ kho bo cag gi zhing dag las 'khrud pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas bcad par bya ba ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags par
315a1(mdo sde): bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing / de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas dbul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur cing
315a2(mdo sde): skye bo tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang po bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/ / zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na/ nyam pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so//
315a3(mdo sde): chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing / tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur
315a4(mdo sde): kyi tshe/ mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'ong mdzes zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe/ mi rnams
315a5(mdo sde): kyi ming tshur shog tshur shog ces bya bar gyur to/ / 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe/ mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to// go'u ta ma dge ba'i bu dge
315a6(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ste/ go'u tam dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe/ mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to// dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ go'u ta ma ngag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe/
315a7(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor rmen pa zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyan te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba
315b1(mdo sde): bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ / de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig
315b2(mdo sde): byang ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang / de rnams kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas
315b3(mdo sde): ri res nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu zhes bya bar grags so/ / go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe/ mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed//
315b4(mdo sde): nye bar rtog par byed de// de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas/ bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas/ des na de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes
315b5(mdo sde): bya bar grags so/ / go'u ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin
315b6(mdo sde): tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes
315b7(mdo sde): pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu
316a1(mdo sde): ba yin pas da rung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ / go'u tam dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rma ma zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu
316a2(mdo sde): mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes
316a3(mdo sde): pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing
316a4(mdo sde): mthu che ba yin pas/ da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byang du 'jug go// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rma na zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu
316a5(mdo sde): mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa
316a6(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas/ ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing nabu che ba
316a7(mdo sde): yin pas da dung du yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ go'u ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rman zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te
316b1(mdo sde): dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'anga' ba bzhin du cung zad gnod pa mi bskyed do// de smin nas brtol ba/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i ma
316b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas/ ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du yang
316b3(mdo sde): gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ / go'u ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'ong mdzes so// 'od mdzes kyi dge pa'o// dge ba'i dge mchog go// dge
316b4(mdo sde): mchog gi gso sbyong 'phags so/ / gso sbyong 'phags kyi nga las nu'o// nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o// mdzes pa'i nye mdzes so// nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan no// nye mdzes ldan dang / bzang po
316b5(mdo sde): dang / legs bzang dang / btang ba dang / btang bzung dang / yan lag dang / yan lag shing rta dang / ngan spong dang / skal ldan shing rta dang // rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang
316b6(mdo sde): sha ku ni dang / sha ku ni chen po dang / ku sha dang / nye ba'i ku sha dang / ku sha chen po dang / legs mthong dang / legs mthong chen po dang / rab thob dang / rab thob chen po dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags dang

317a1(mdo sde): ngag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya bam pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste
317a2(mdo sde): dgra 'dul bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to/ / go'u ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshug

317b7(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo //

318b1(mdo sde): 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/ de rnams kyi pha ma ni rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo // go'u ta ma dag rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud

319a1(mdo sde): dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhus dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta sra ba'o//

319a3(mdo sde): ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba// bla na med pa
319a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam
319a5(mdo sde): btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyes so// go'u ta ma dag rgyal po legs kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang
319a6(mdo sde): sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo // go'u ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ go'u ta ma dang / ba ra dwa dza'o//
319a7(mdo sde): de gnyis las go'u ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o// ba ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o// de pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas/ nges bsams pa
319b1(mdo sde): bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas na/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas/ 'dir ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim
319b2(mdo sde): med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsam nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag ni ngang
319b3(mdo sde): pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / / des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'dir
319b4(mdo sde): ched yin te/ nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ong ste/ rgyal po byed par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thog go/
319b5(mdo sde): delta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig/ rab tu 'byung ngo // de nas rgyal pos gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo // de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so// de nas gzhon
319b6(mdo sde): nu go'u ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas/ dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la
319b7(mdo sde): phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis/ bdag rab tu phyung shig/ des de rab tu phyung ngo // drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas
320a1(mdo sde): de yang drang srong go'u ta ma/ drang srong go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po rna ba can shi nas/ gzhon nu ba ra dA dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
320a2(mdo sde): la dbang byed du bcug go/ / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong go'u ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po dgon pa'i gnas na zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis/ grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o//
320a3(mdo sde): des smras pa/ bu rung gis grong ngam dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/ khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nyen 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug shig
320a4(mdo sde): mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong go'u ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so// de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu
320a5(mdo sde): g.yo can pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/ des dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro// de nas gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ mi gzhan zhig kar sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs
320a6(mdo sde): pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na/ kar sha pa Na lnga brgya yang mi thob la/ khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te/ gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs
320a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ song la pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mching nas re shig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas
320b1(mdo sde): smras so/ / mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas/ de de dang dga' dgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo // des bsams pa/ namachod ring du yod pas/ de'i sems kyang bsrung /
320b2(mdo sde): babar nus so snyam nas/ des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la/ jo mo'i mching nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ bskyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig/ de'i gan du song nas
320b3(mdo sde): smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de de dang rags mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa// rje'i sras/ skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags
320b4(mdo sde): mod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skye la gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod do// de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing / gnod sems kyis kun nas
320b5(mdo sde): dkris pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la/ bzang mo pad+ma'i rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog shig ces byos shig/ de song nas bzang mo la smras nas/ de nas de bskyed
320b6(mdo sde): mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par rigs sam/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ nga ni bdag
320b7(mdo sde): gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud mang ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do// de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad //
321a1(mdo sde): jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po kun gyis thos nas/ rgyugs pa dang / ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong go'u ta ma gnas so// de nas skyes
321a2(mdo sde): bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas/ ral gri khrag can drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skye bo'i tshogs chen po des ral gri khrag can mthong nas
321a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes de nas drang srong go'u ta ma de bskor te/ mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kA ye rab tu byung ba/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/
321a4(mdo sde): des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' dgur sprad nas de bsad do// des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes/ des zhi bas smras kyang skye bo'i
321a5(mdo sde): tshogs des lag pa phying ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spung nas de bkum lags so// rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas nges
321a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na/ rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis/ gsal shing la shon cig/ de nas rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bi ra'i 'phreng ba mgul tu btags shing / skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa
321a7(mdo sde): lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas
321b1(mdo sde): gson po nyid du gsal shing la bskyon no/ / de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas/ des phan tshun du btsal bar
321b2(mdo sde): brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon pa mthong nas/ de skad mi gsal zhing / mig mchis mas gang la/ snying rje ba'i tshig dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad mi
321b3(mdo sde): gsal zhing yid chad la/ gnang du bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po// gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma phyung ba 'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang /
321b4(mdo sde): mkhan po bdag gi lus kyi rma phyung gi/ sems kyi ma yin no// bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis/ gson cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ bdag gis lus kyi rma phyung gi/
321b5(mdo sde): sems kyi ma yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas/
321b6(mdo sde): tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing / gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces
321b7(mdo sde): bya bar gyur te/ de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to// de nas drang ba go'u tams smras pa/ mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang / skye ba ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lags/ des smras pa/
322a1(mdo sde): bu bram ze rnams nar bu med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na/ khyod kyi bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po// yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed na/ bdag gzhon
322a2(mdo sde): nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skye ba lta ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas
322a3(mdo sde): da ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing / tshigs rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/ ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob
322a4(mdo sde): ba yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyi rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pa de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang / rlung grang mos reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas// des sngon
322a5(mdo sde): gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ / gang gi tshe des 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo // bsam gyis
322a6(mdo sde): mi khyab pa'i gnas ni gzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi yul sems
322a7(mdo sde): pa'o/ / khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i
322b1(mdo sde): bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so/ / de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o// de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ong
322b2(mdo sde): te/ shib mthong nas/ de gsal shing gi nyen kor du bltas na sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gsab tu zhugs pa las// ji tsam na khye'u
322b3(mdo sde): gnyis shig mthong ngo / / des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrod
322b4(mdo sde): nas bsnun bstod de/ des de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas/ des na nyi ma'i
322b5(mdo sde): rigs shes bya bar gyur to/ / drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma/ go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas/ ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan
322b6(mdo sde): lag skyes shes bya bar gyur to/ / bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas/ ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po ba ra dA dza bu med par shi nas
322b7(mdo sde): blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal
323a1(mdo sde): srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/ / de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste/ son pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la
323a2(mdo sde): gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po go'u ta ma gang du mchis/ nges smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na
323a3(mdo sde): ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o// ma nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na/ sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam yang smos pa yang bsgrags
323a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin gyis zhog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas 'di dang 'di'o// skyon med pa gnod pa ma byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas
323a5(mdo sde): par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smras par byed pa na/ khye'u
323a6(mdo sde): de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong che no khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes
323a7(mdo sde): 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis de thos te mngon du ngo mtshar skyes nas/ de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas/ de gnyis
323b1(mdo sde): las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang bu med par shi'o/ / de nas gcig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to//
323b2(mdo sde): go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams tha ma ni rgyal po bu ra ma shing ba 'jag
323b3(mdo sde): skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / / go'u ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes mo la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdu ba can no//
323b4(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la btad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de/
323b5(mdo sde): thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na
323b6(mdo sde): ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod na nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur// lha/ dgongs
323b7(mdo sde): shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo// ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de mi rnams kyis brtags te
324a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i drung du dong nas/ de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug shig/ de nas de rnams rgyal po'i
324a2(mdo sde): spyan sngar dong nas/ rkang pa gdugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/ gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur
324a3(mdo sde): cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cigasol/ rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rer
324a4(mdo sde): bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag blta na sbyin no// lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal
324a5(mdo sde): mchis la lha la stan tu gdags par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong nas/ rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gzhon nu chas
324a6(mdo sde): phu bor gyur pa/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no// lha/ don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ re shig btsun mo blangs la// lha de dang
324a7(mdo sde): lhan cig rtsed mo dang dgyes pa dang dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig/ de la khye'u btsal bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ spri ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal// rgyal pos smras pa
324b1(mdo sde): shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste// ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang ldan
324b2(mdo sde): cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to//
324b3(mdo sde): de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags
324b4(mdo sde): zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal sring dga' zhes bgyi'o// khye'u rgyal srid
324b5(mdo sde): dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// nga rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa/ de'i zhang po rgyal
324b6(mdo sde): bos thos nas des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring ba/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs zhing / dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na lags gal te de ltar ma byas na
324b7(mdo sde): khyod kyi mthu dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig/ kho bo'o nir 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar brlag go// rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pas/ des thos nas skrag ste/
325a1(mdo sde): blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lga rgyal srid dga'
325a2(mdo sde): rgyal tshab tu dbang skur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches bu bor gyur pa// rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no//
325a3(mdo sde): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi
325a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni skyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar sprug/ lha/ bdag cag ni
325a5(mdo sde): blon po legs te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa yang sdug la/ skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa ni bzhag go// rgyal pos
325a6(mdo sde): btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ / blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan ngag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs
325a7(mdo sde): byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes/ de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun phyang mang po btags// me tog sna tshog
325b1(mdo sde): kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go/ / de nas de rnams kyis/ blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas/ gzhon nu rgong bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi/

325b5(mdo sde): legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis/ lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so// rgyal po ches pa dang / skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan
325b6(mdo sde): ngag skyed mos tshal na ku co'o sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa

326a2(mdo sde): de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams

326a4(mdo sde): mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/ gnas
326a5(mdo sde): btab nas ri dgas bsad cing / bsad nas 'tshe ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong sar skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed de/ lang tshe dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas/ 'dod chags kyis
326a6(mdo sde): shin tu nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/ / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bsang bseng por gyur/ de rnams kyis

326b1(mdo sde): chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgying rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo // de na de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas/ 'dod pa'i

327b7(mdo sde): bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no// go'u ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gram dang / seng ge sgra'o// go'u ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji

328a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa
328a7(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas/ chos kyi gtam smras pa yang
328b1(mdo sde): khyod legs so/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te/ chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na de rnams la yun ring por phan pa dang

328b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / / de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa
328b7(mdo sde): dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyeng ba dang / chom rkun med cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa// 'bras dang / bu ram shing
329a1(mdo sde): gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du legs par rab sad ces
329a2(mdo sde): bya ba rgyal po byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang
329a3(mdo sde): chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ / 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa ni/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po
329a4(mdo sde): legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi ni zhes bya ba yod do// lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs
329a5(mdo sde): spyo che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang
329a6(mdo sde): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags
329a7(mdo sde): nas/ den dga' ba'i rtseng mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lum bi nas de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga kun
329b1(mdo sde): dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang po gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis
329b2(mdo sde): lum bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags po'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po seng ge 'gram la yun ring po nas/ kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la
329b3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ / rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i
329b4(mdo sde): bsam pa 'di yod do/ / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur
329b5(mdo sde): nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang
329b6(mdo sde): pos rgyal po legs par rab sang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/ 'on te
329b7(mdo sde): las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ / de bcas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya chen byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gangags zhes ming 'jog par byed do//
330a1(mdo sde): blon po rnams kyi smras pa/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo rnams su gleng pa/ kha cig gi mchid
330a2(mdo sde): nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mchod nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na
330a3(mdo sde): ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phral ma
330a4(mdo sde): ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pas/ bu zhig
330a5(mdo sde): bca' bar 'gyur ba zhig stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ / yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug
330a6(mdo sde): ba/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang mo// rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de bcas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta
330a7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ de'i gzugs bzang ba/ rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so// de btsas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par
330b1(mdo sde): bye do/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so// de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang /
330b2(mdo sde): mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhige btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zhes lung bstan to//
330b3(mdo sde): rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni/ sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams
330b4(mdo sde): cang phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
330b5(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / / de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis// 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge 'gram
330b6(mdo sde): gyis slar spring ba/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la bzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu
330b7(mdo sde): btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de re shig 'dod do// gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o// des 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o//
331a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bsang zhes bya ba ri khrod pa gcig yod nas/ shAkya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya bseng ri khrod
331a2(mdo sde): pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis/ grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo rgas pas/ de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so// lha/ gzhon nu zas
331a3(mdo sde): gtsang btang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa'i dam pa de sbyin pa lta na gtong ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin
331a4(mdo sde): 'tshal/ sprul bar bgyi'o// rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la sngo nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste rma ga bta'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas
331a5(mdo sde): rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lga/ gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rme ga bta' lags pas/ bdag cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig/
331a6(mdo sde): dbul lo// shes ldan dag/ shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa/ sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma bzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so// lha/ ci khrims 'dral lam/ nges smras pa/ lhag par
331a7(mdo sde): shin tu bsdam byinal par mi byan 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig spong ba ni mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa yin no/ / lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis/ legs par
331b1(mdo sde): rab sang la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis/ bu mo gcig shos kyang bkri shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri te/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so//
331b2(mdo sde): ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhin/ rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo
331b3(mdo sde): dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'bab pa dang / 'bab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / mahe

331b5(mdo sde): nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas
331b6(mdo sde): gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro//
331b7(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsa r+ya d+ham shId+ha rba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsab dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyud rtsi zhus te gtan la phab pa/
332a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha ba lA d+ha na pra ti har+ya bi kurban nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa
332a2(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chu bo chen po'i klung nai ran dza na'i 'gram
332a3(mdo sde): na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong dang / rab 'byor dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u
332a4(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim
332a5(mdo sde): bdag thams cad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis tshim par byas/ bskul/ gzengs bstod/ yang
332a6(mdo sde): dag par dga' bar byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer wA ra NA sir gshegs te/ wA ra NA sir shing a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs
332a7(mdo sde): so/ / de nas de'i tshe na sa cher g.yos par gyur nas/ seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/ zheng du dpag tshad phyeng tsam gyi tshad les
332b1(mdo sde): par sbas pa/ shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ dar gyi chun po btags shing sbyangs pa/ lha'i na bza' brgya stong du ma bting ba/ lha'i me tog gi chun po bye ba du ma rab tu sbyangs pa
332b2(mdo sde): lha'i dri dang ldan pa/ / kha dog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa de mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig
332b3(mdo sde): byung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
332b4(mdo sde): pa sman ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug khyod song la/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig
332b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan dag na khyod kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can bsdigs pa'i rang bzhin can ma dad pa sdig pa spyod pa/ / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag gis bsgribs pa// mar
332b6(mdo sde): mi shes pa/ phar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad pa/ de dag thams cad lag na rdo rje dang / gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang
332b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi shugs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir sdus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes
333a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa las tshig 'di thos nas/ sems can thams cad la blta ba dang / yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge
333a2(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// de nas lus las 'od zer brgya stong du ma byung ngo // byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
333a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad gzugs man chad yod pa dang / gzugs kyis khyab pa man chad du snang bar byas te/ 'od zer de dag las kyang yang dag par
333a4(mdo sde): bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / bag yod pa dang nyon mongs med par byos// bag med pa'i dbang du ma 'gro shig/ skye dang rga shis gtses pa'i sdug bsngal te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
333a5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'byung bar dkon/ / bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya grangs med du/ srid pa'i rgya mtshor nges par 'khor ba dang / nyon mongs dog par rtag tu 'khor ba na// 'tshe ba ma rungs pa ni skrag mi 'gyur// rnyed
333a6(mdo sde): dang chags dang bud med rtag pa min/ / rtag tu glu gar sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan// bskal pa du mar bde ba myong nas kyang // phyis ni sdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur// rnam par slu bar gyur pa 'di la ltos//
333a7(mdo sde): 'di la mar gyur pa yang chung mar 'gyur// de yi sha dag yongs su zos nas kyang // mi mkhas pa dag mi shes dga' bar 'dzin// srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba de// mis ni ma myong med la skrag
333b1(mdo sde): pa med/ mi rnams kyi ni dam pa'i chos 'chad kyis// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par 'dod rnams deng // mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba de mthong nas// ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgom pa thob 'gyur gyis/ de phyir sdug
333b2(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtsho mi gang rnams/ / skrag par gyis la thar pa 'dod par byos// mi rnams kyi ni dam pa de la mchod// gzhan gyi srog ni ma gcod de bzhin du// gzhan gyi nor dag ma byin len ma byed//
333b3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi bud med dag la 'tshe ma byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos// nga rgyal rgyags dang brlang ba spangs nas kyang // wA ra NA si zhe ni bya ba yi// a mra srung ba mo yi tshal du deng // mi

333b5(mdo sde): bya dang / sems can bye ba mang po thar bya'i phyir// 'od gzer rtag tu gang gis btang ba de// mtshan ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go// gang dag nga rgyal rgyags khengs bgyid gyur cing // sangs
333b6(mdo sde): rgyas chos la rim gro mi byed pa/ / lag na rdo rje mgon po sems can mchog/ rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhing go bar byed// de yi gzugs ni yangs shing rdzu 'phrul che// bskal pa bye bar de ni bshad
333b7(mdo sde): mi rdzogs/ / 'dir ni bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i phyir// dri dang phreng ba gos mchog rgyan khyer la// mi yi 'dren pa 'di la mchod par byos// sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba rab dkon no//
334a1(mdo sde): 'dod phyir bskal pa bye ba mang por yang // rtag tu sdug bsngal thob cing thob par 'gyur// mkhas pas rtag tu thar par 'dod par gyis// mi mchog sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa
334a2(mdo sde): byos/ bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang / pha ma chung ma bshes mang skye bo rnams// thams cad sgyu ma 'dra bas don med de// rtag par gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur// de ltar gser dang da ngul
334a3(mdo sde): yang glog pa 'dra/ / 'di kha snying po 'ga' yang snang ba med// byang chub go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir// mi rnams 'dren pa la ni mchod par byos// de nas de'i tshe na 'od zer las byung ba'i tshigs su
334a4(mdo sde): bcad pas bskul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'dis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khams sgras gang bar gyur nas/ sems can thams cad la bskul bar gyur te/
334a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag log par lta ba de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod par gyur/ gang dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs pa dang // 'gying ba de dag ni nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / khengs

334a7(mdo sde): dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/ thams cad

335a1(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / lha'i me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / rin po che'i shing dang / dpag bsams kyi shing dang / gos kyi shing rnams kyis
